description: Set in central Paris, Suites Helzear Montparnasse offers furnished suites and apartments as well as a garden with a terrace. It is 10 minutes' walk from the Montparnasse Tower and Jardin du Luxembourg is 1.5 km away. The apartments feature a flat-screen TV, iPod docking station, ironing facilities and safety deposit box. It also includes a private bathroom and fully-equipped kitchen. Some apartments have air conditioning. Guests can order catered meals. Local cafes and restaurants can be reached within a 10-minute walk. Gaité Metro Station is 500 metres away from Suites Helzear Montparnasse. Denfert-Rochereau Metro and RER Station is an 8-minute from the property and the RER line B takes you to Roissy – Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports.

name: District Nation
description: Located 500 metres from Place de la Nation in Paris, the hotel District Nation is a non-smoking property offering a 24-hour reception and luggage storage. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. District Nation features free WiFi throughout the property. Continental breakfast can be enjoyed at an extra cost, either in the breakfast room. Bastille lively district is 20 minute away by walk and Pere Lachaise can also be reached within 20 minute. Guests can easily reach the Champs Elysées within 20 minutes by public transport. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18.5 km from the property.

name: La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris by The Crest Collection
description: Located in the 16th district of Paris, La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris by The Crest Collection is just 900 metres from the Eiffel Tower and 4.4 km from Parc des Princes Stadium. Set in 2 uniquely decorated buildings the property features a landscaped garden and a fitness room. The contemporary-style rooms are equipped with a minibar and a TV with cable channels. Each room has a private bathroom decorated with white marble furnishings and is equipped with complimentary toiletries and slippers. Free WiFi is available throughout the residence. A continental breakfast is served in the breakfast room or guests can order breakfast in their rooms. Free hot drinks, juice and pastries are served every day from 15:00 until 17:00. Additional facilities include a laundry and dry cleaning service. A business centre and meeting/banqueting facilities are also available for guests' convenience. With private parking on site, the hotel is only 300 metres from Trocadéro Metro Station, providing access to the Champs Elysées.

name: Hotel Raphael
description: Situated a 2-minute walk from the Champs-Elysees and the Arc de Triomphe, this 5-star hotel offers luxury accommodation in the heart of Paris. It offers a panoramic terrace and a gastronomic restaurant. Decorated in a Louis 15th and 16th style, guest rooms feature wooden furnishings and elaborate wall hangings. They include a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some of the suites feature a balcony, views of the Eiffel Tower and lounge area. Chef proposes gourmet French cuisine at the sophisticated Raphael Restaurant. Guests can relax and have a snack, tea, drink or just relax in the English Bar's red velvet armchairs. During the summer season, guests can quench your thirst or sit down for a summertime meal on the splendid rooftop located on the 7th floor. Like is a true hanging garden, the rooftop offers a panoramic 360° view over Paris where guests can take in the Eiffel Tower, the Arc de Triomphe, the Sacré Cœur. Other facilities at the hotel include free Wi-Fi access, hammam, a sauna and a fitness room. Charles de Gaulle – Etoile Metro Station is just 400 metres away, providing direct access to the Louvre Museum and the Grand Palais. Trocadero is a 15-minute walk away, which offers one of the best views of the Eiffel Tower in Paris.

name: 7 Eiffel by Malone
description: Strategically located in the heart of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Paris. Rooms are air conditioned and a Wi-Fi connection is provided free of charge. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Airport transfers and a dry cleaning service are available on request. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Le 7 Eiffel Hotel have an iPod docking station, a mini bar and a private balcony. The private bathroom includes complimentary toiletries in addition to a hair dryer, bathrobes and slippers. Le 7 Eiffel Hotel is close to Paris's well-known attractions, with 7th Arrondissement of Paris just a 10-minute stroll away. Seine is around a 20-minute drive away.Revato

name: Maxim Quartier Latin
description: Hotel Maxim is located on the left bank of the River Seine, in the heart of the Latin Quarter. It is 350 metres from The Jardin des Plantes and offers free WiFi access. Each soundproofed guestroom at the Hotel Hôtel Maxim Quartier Latin is decorated in a contemporary style and equipped with satellite TV, a telephone and a work desk. Some of the rooms have a balcony. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the breakfast room or in the hotel’s courtyard patio when the weather is nice. The hotel’s reception desk is open 24 hours a day and there are free newspapers in the lobby. Metro Station Censier-Daubenton is 120 metres from the hotel and offers direct access to The Louvre and Opera Garnier. Notre-Dame Cathedral and Luxembourg Gardens are 1.4 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Pulitzer Paris
description: Pulitzer Paris is located in Paris’s 9th district and is a 12-minute walk from Opera Garnier. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a bar and free Wi-Fi. The soundproofed rooms at Pulitzer Paris feature a monochromatic decor. Each is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower. Pulitzer Paris serves a daily buffet breakfast with fresh and cooked foods. Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel’s bar before exploring a range of restaurants in the neighbourhood. Hotel staff are available 24 hours and both cars and bicycles can be rented directly from the hotel. Pulitzer is a 2-minute walk from Grands Boulevards Metro (lines 8 and 9) and Le Peletier Metro (line 7). It is also possible to walk to local sights such as the Musée du Louvre (20 mins).

name: Hotel Daunou Opera
description: A 2-minute walk from the Opéra Garnier, Daunou Opéra offers rooms with free WiFi. It is 200 metres from Opéra Metro Station, which goes directly to the Louvre Museum. Flat-screen TVs and free newspapers feature in the rooms at Daunou Opera. All rooms are decorated in cream and chocolate brown tones and the suites have a seating area. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room, or a continental breakfast can be served in guest rooms. Bread and pastries are baked at the hotel. Other facilities at Daunou include a 24-hour reception which offers luggage storage and an airport shuttle service. The famous Galeries Lafayette and Printemps luxury department stores are a 5-minute walk from the hotel, while the well-known cocktail bar, Harry's New York Bar, is situated opposite the hotel. Opéra Metro Station is 200 metres from the hotel and a direct bus to Charles de Gaulle Airport departs 300 metres away.

name: Hotel Sleeping Belle
description: Hotel Sleeping Belle sits just 700 metres from the Place de la Bastille in the east of Paris and a 3-minute walk to the Gare de Lyon Train Station. Its en suite rooms have free WiFi. The modern rooms feature red and white décor. They all have a flat-screen TV and air-conditioning. A buffet breakfast is available daily from 05:00 to 11:00 and can be served to your guest room at an additional charge. Notre Dame Cathedral is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. The Metro Line 1 is 700 metres away and offers direct access to the Louvre Museum, the Champs-Elysées and the La Défense business district.

name: Hôtel Les 3 Poussins
description: Hôtel 3 Poussins is located in the 9th district of Paris, within walking distance of Montmartre, Opera Garnier and the large department stores. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access. The spacious guest rooms are individually furnished and feature air conditioning, satellite TV and have lift access. They overlooks the patio or the courtyard. A continental breakfast with hot and cold items is served daily in the attic breakfast room. Hôtel 3 Poussins provides a 24 hour front desk and can make restaurant, theatre and tour reservations. Guests also have access to a shared living room with library and a laundry service is available at a surcharge. Hôtel 3 Poussins is just 150 metres from the Saint Georges metro stop offering access to the many sites of the capital. A public car park is available opposite the hotel.

name: Le Marquis Eiffel
description: Just a 5-minute walk to the Eiffel Tower, this boutique hotel offers elegant rooms and is a 10-minute walk from the Trocadero Gardens. Guest rooms at Le Marquis Eiffel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Room service is available. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are included in the bathrooms, while some rooms also provide bathrobes. In the morning, guests can choose from a buffet or a continental breakfast served on the outdoor terrace. Hotel Le Marquis Eiffel also features a lounge bar and a library. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire hotel. Reception is open 24 hours at Le Marquis Eiffel, and there is a concierge service that can make reservations for restaurants and theatre shows upon request. The nearest Metro stop is Dupleix which provides direct access to the Arc de Triomphe, Effel Tower and Trocadero.

name: Sofitel Paris Arc de Triomphe
description: Our 5-star luxury hotel is a true haven of peace being in a very calm street, and yet close to the bustling Champs Elysées, the main fashion avenues and great museums. With its Haussmann façade and contemporary interior design, it will seduce you for business trips and family weekends. The Parisian rooms and suites, Les Cocottes restaurant and its terrace with Chef Christian Constant will make your stay unforgettable.accorhotels.com

name: New Hotel Lafayette
description: New Hotel Lafayette is located in the Opera district, 300 metres from Cadet Metro Station. It offers contemporary rooms with Wi-Fi access and is just 1 km from Gare du Nord. Combining original wooden beams with a modern décor, the rooms at New Hotel Lafayette feature a TV with satellite channels and a bottle of mineral water. Each is air-conditioned and the en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. The breakfast room is located in the arched cellar and offers a buffet breakfast every morning. After an aperitif in the hotel bar, the 24-hour reception can advise guests on restaurants in the local area. Galeries Lafayette department store and the Sacré Coeur Basilica are both a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Cadet Metro Station leads to tourist attractions such as the Opéra Garnier and the Louvre Museum.

name: Le General Hotel
description: Situated in Paris’ 11th district, General Hotel is just a 5-minute walk from Republique Square and has a fitness centre with sauna. Accommodations feature a Nespresso coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. All the air-conditioned rooms at Le Général Hôtel have an iPod docking station. L'Occitane amenities are included in each private bathroom, which is equipped with a hairdryer and bathtub or shower. Sweet and savoury breakfast items can be served directly to guests’ rooms or selected from the buffet. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s bar and enjoy the selection of international newspapers. The Hotel General is 350 metres from Republique Metro Station, which offers connections to 4 metro lines. Shopping and cafés in the popular Marais district are 500 metres away. The Georges Pompidou Centre is a 30-minute walk from the hotel.

name: 9Confidentiel
address: 58 Rue du Roi de Sicile, 75004 Paris
description: Ideally set in the centre of Paris, 9Confidentiel features continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is allergy-free and is situated less than 1 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. Guest rooms have a wardrobe. There is an in-house bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Pompidou Centre, Sainte-Chapelle and Opéra Bastille. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 17 km from 9Confidentiel.

name: Hotel Beaugrenelle Tour Eiffel
description: Located on the left bank in central Paris, this hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower and the departure point of the Bateaux Mouches cruise boats. It has a 24-hour reception and a lounge with a computer and marble flooring. The air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a mini fridge, cable TV and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has a bathroom including a hairdryer at hotel Beaugrenelle. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the spacious breakfast room at Beaugrenelle Tour Eiffel. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar while reading the newspapers provided. Dupleix Metro Station is 240 metres away, providing access to the Arc de Triomphe and the famous Champs Elysées, the Eiffel Tower and Montparnasse Railway Station.

name: Hotel Marceau Champs Elysees
description: This hotel is located in the heart of Paris, 600 metres from the Champs-Elysees and the Arc de Triomphe. Hotel Marceau Champs-Elysees offers soundproofed rooms with free WiFi access. Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. All room are accessible by a lift. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining area. The Marceau Champs-Elysees front desk is opened 24/7 with concierge service. Marceau Champs-Elysees is 450 metres from the River Seine and 1.4 km from the Jardin du Trocadero and the Eiffel Tower. Metro station Alma Marceau is 400 metres from the hotel, giving direct access to Saint-Lazare and Nation.

name: Kopster Hotel Paris Porte de Versailles
description: KOPSTER, the Lifestyle signature of Lavorel Hotels. The Kopster Hotel Paris Porte de Versailles, a lifestyleestablishment, welcomes you in an original and warm setting where life is good. Whether you are in Paris for a professional event or with your family, enjoy a moment of relaxation in a friendly and relaxed atmosphere. The Kopster Hotel is above all a place that looks like you, far from the codes and standards.The hotel has 127 modern and comfortable rooms with a cool and unique spirit. Our Authentik and Unik rooms are the perfect placeto stay for singles or couples. The Suites K have a living room and can accommodate up to 4 people. All our rooms are equipped with all the necessary amenities for optimal comfort, a modern bathroom and numerous conveniences such as unlimited highspeed WiFi and a courtesy tray.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Alhambra
description: Hotel Alhambra is located in a lively area of Paris, a 2-minute walk from the Marais district. It features a 400 m² private garden, free WiFi and a shuttle to the airport. The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Most rooms offer a view of the garden and each room has a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. A buffet breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed in the breakfast room or on the garden's terrace, weather dependent. Other facilities at Hotel Alhambra include a 24-hour reception and a computer available at the reception that guests can use. Popular entertainment venues, the Cirque d'Hiver and the Bataclan are just 100 metres from the hotel. Oberkampf Metro Station is just 40 metres away and provides access to Place de la Bastille.

name: Hotel Regence Paris
description: Regence Hotel Paris is located in the 8th arrondissement between Opera and Montmartre, in the heart of Paris' major theatre and cabaret district. All of the rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free WiFi and an LCD TV with satellite channels. A safe, minibar and telephone are also available. Most of them are also provided with a balcony. Guests can enjoy a free cup of coffee at the reception, which is open 24 hours a day. From the hotel, guests can easily reach the Champs-Elysées, Arc de Triomphe and the Place de l’Opera, on foot or via public transport. Bicycle rental is also available at the property for an additional charge.

name: Hotel Bridget
description: Situated in Paris, 4 km from Gare du Nord, Hotel Bridget features views of the city. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.9 km from Opéra Bastille. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk. All guest rooms in Hotel Bridget are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Languages spoken at the reception include English and French, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed. Gare de l'Est is 4.1 km from Hotel Bridget, while Pompidou Centre is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Aston
description: Located in Paris’s Grands Boulevards area, 1 km from Opéra Garnier, this boutique hotel is located in a traditional Haussmanian building and offers air-conditioned guestrooms with free Wi-Fi. Guest rooms at Hotel Aston are bright with a modern décor. They each have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Some rooms have a small balcony. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the hotel’s breakfast room with an arched stone ceiling. Breakfast can also be served in guests’ rooms upon request. The reception desk at Hotel Aston is open 24 hours a day and offers a ticket reservation service for shows and excursions. Grands Boulevards Metro Station is located 270 metres from the hotel and provides direct access to The Eiffel Tower. Galeries Lafayette department store is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Cambon
description: Set in the 1st district in central Paris, this 4-star hotel is 50 metres from the Tuileries Garden and a 10-minute walk from the Louvre Museum. The Hotel Cambon features an extensive collection of artistic objects and paintings. Each air-conditioned room includes satellite TV and a minibar. Some rooms offer a private terrace or balcony with views of the Tuileries Garden. All rooms are individually decorated with bright colours. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Hotel Cambon. Guests can enjoy drinks in the hotel bar, which features a glass roof. Hotel Cambon is a 5-minute walk from the Place Vendôme and Rue Saint Honoré. Concorde Metro Station is 50 metres away, providing access to the Champs Elysées. Free WiFi is provided throughout the hotel.

name: Best Western Plus Quartier Latin Pantheon
description: Ideally located in the heart of the Latin Quarter, within walking distance from the rue Mouffetard, The Pantheon, the Botanical Gardens and the National History Museum, and Notre Dame Cathedral. The 37 guest rooms entirely air conditioned in 2005 and redecorated in a modern style in 2006, are all complete with private en suite bathrooms equipped with a bathtub or a shower and hairdryers, remote control cable TV, direct dial phones, automatic alarm clocks, air conditioning and a wireless Internet connection. Access: Métro: 7 Place Monge 10: cardinal Lemoine Bus: 47, 67, 89 Gare: Austerlitz Gare: Lyon.bestwestern.com

name: Stella Etoile
description: Stella Etoile is situated in the heart of Paris. It is just 200 metres L’Arc de Triomphe and a 5-minute walk from the Champs Elysees. It offers modern accommodation and free WiFi access throughout. The en suite guest rooms at Stella Etoile are decorated in a contemporary style. Modern facilities include a satellite TV and a mini bar. Guests can have a drink at the bar and read in the hotel’s library. Hôtel Stella is 90 metres from the Metro and RER Station Charles de Gaulle – Etoile, which can take guests to the other famous sights in Paris.

name: Hotel de Montesquieu
description: Located in the chic 8th district of Paris, Hotel de Montesquieu is a boutique hotel with unique décor of French style and oriental spirit. The Champs-Elysées is only a 5-minute walk away and the fashionable Rue Faubourg Saint-Honoré is 230 metres from the hotel. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a minibar with a complimentary water, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hotel de Montesquieu. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the bar salon lobby. Additional features include a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access throughout. Saint-Philippe-du-Roule Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away and offers direct access to Opéra Garnier and the Eiffer Tower. Any reservation of more than 2 rooms may entail special conditions and additional costs

name: Hôtel Bonne Nouvelle
description: Hotel Bonne Nouvelle offers low-cost accommodation between Opera and Republique. It has 24-hour reception and Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The Bonne Nouvelle guest rooms are equipped with a TV and private bathroom with a shower. Each room is decorated in a unique, original style. The rooms are accessible by lift. Hotel Bonne Nouvelle is conveniently located 200 metres from the Bonne Nouvelle Metro (lines 8 and 9) giving direct access to Opera Garnier as well as Printemps and Galeries Lafayette department stores. The hotel is also within walking distance of Les Halles, Palais Royale and the famous Marais district.

name: Hotel Odeon Saint-Germain
description: Located in a lively district in central Paris, this 4-star hotel, decorated by Jacques Garcia, is set in a 16th-century building with an interior courtyard. The property is fully air-conditioned both in the rooms and in the reception area. Its guestrooms feature a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a minibar and feature a dressing room. All rooms at hotel Odeon Saint Germain are decorated with silk curtains. Each room includes welcome gifts by L’Occitane. A breakfast buffet is served every morning at the Odeon Saint Germain. Guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar featuring original stonework. With a 24-hour reception, the hotel provides an airport shuttle and a ticket service. Notre Dame Cathedral is a 12-minute walk from the hotel. Odeon Metro Station is 280 metres away, providing access to the Montmartre district.

name: Hotel 10 Opera
description: Hotel 10 Opéra by HappyCulture is located 350 metres from Opéra Garnier and the Galeries Lafayette. Rooms at Hotel 10 have free WiFi access, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are accessible by lift and ironing facilities are also provided, upon request. A breakfast buffet is served daily. Opera Metro Station is a 3-minute walk from the hotel and provides direct links to the Louvre, Eiffel Tower, St Lazare Train Station, Gare de Lyon Train Station and Disneyland Paris Park. The Roissy bus to Charles de Gaulle Airport can also be accessed beside Opera Garnier.

name: Les Jardins de Mademoiselle Hotel & Spa
description: Situated in Paris, 2.4 km from Eiffel Tower, Jardins de Mademoiselle Hôtel & Spa features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel offers an indoor pool, hammam and a concierge service. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk. Rooms include a coffee machine, while certain rooms have a terrace and others also boast city views. The rooms in Jardins de Mademoiselle Hôtel & Spa are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Continental and American breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Jardins de Mademoiselle Hôtel & Spa offers a spa centre. Rodin Museum is 2.6 km from the hotel, while Orsay Museum is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from Jardins de Mademoiselle Hôtel & Spa.

name: Caumartin Opera - Astotel
description: Just 350 metres from Opera Garnier and 200 metres from shopping on the Grands Boulevards, Caumartin Opéra is a great base for exploring Paris on foot or by public transport. A flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access is provided in the air-conditioned rooms. Each is decorated in warm neutral tones and has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Each room also includes complimentary non-alcoholic beverages in the minibar A full buffet breakfast is served every morning in the colourful breakfast room.Room service is also available throughout the day at Hotel Caumartin Opéra. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. Havre Caumartin Metro Station is 230 metres from the hotel. Disneyland Paris can be accessed from Auber RER Station which is 250 metres away. The Louvre Museum is a 20-minute walk from Caumartin Opéra.

name: Bonsoir Madame
description: Bonsoir Madame is located in one of the prestigious left bank’s quiet streets, close to the Luxembourg Gardens. It is a 5-minute walk from Rennes Metro Station and offers a lounge with a library and fireplace where guests can enjoy a drink. Each room at Bonsoir Madame is individually decorated and features a flat-screen smart TV, a safe and a minibar. A bottle of water and free WiFi access are offered in all rooms. A buffet breakfast featuring fresh and organic ingredients is available every morning and can be enjoyed in the privacy of the guest rooms. Additional hotel facilities include a 24-hour reception, a concierge service and luggage storage. Luxembourg RER station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and provides access to Charles de Gaulle Airport. Other local transport links lead to attractions such as Montmartre and Place de la Concorde.

name: Hotel Crayon by Elegancia
description: Located in the heart of the historical center of Paris, between culture, in-fashion places and public gardens ï¿½ Beaubourg Center, the Louvre, the Opera, the Place des Victoires, the Forum des Halles and the gardens of the Royal Palace ï¿½ an address to remember.WIHP

name: Hotel Villa Boheme
description: Located under a 5-minute walk from both Pigalle and Saint-Georges metro stations, Hôtel Villa Bohème offers a 24-hour reception and rooms with lift access. Free Wi-Fi access is provided. Each air-conditioned room features a modern décor and has a flat-screen TV, an electric kettle and a safe. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available daily and hot drinks and pastries are offered all day from 11:00. You will find a wide choice of shops, restaurants, cafés and bars in the area. The Montmartre area, with the Sacré Coeur Basilica, and the Galeries La Fayette shopping centre are both a 15-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel Elysées Céramic
description: Welcome to the Elysées Ceramic HotelA lovely, charming hotel lies concealed behind its opulent, registered Art Nouveau facade with sculpted painted ceramics, a few steps away from the Arc de Triomphe, the Champs Elysées and the luxury shops of the Rue du Faubourg Saint Honoré.Bienvenue sur le site officiel de lHotel Elysées Ceramic. En réservant sur notre site, nous vous garantissons les meilleurs tarifs sur Internet (pour un type de chambre identique et pour la même date de réservation). Si vous trouvez moins cher ailleurs, nous vous remboursons la différence si vous réservez sur notre site.Welcome on the official Elysées Ceramic website. Book on line and you are guaranteed to get, for the same kind of room and same booking period, the best available rate on the Internet. If you find a better rate, book on our site and we will reimburse you the difference.WIHP

name: Hotel Hor Les Lumieres
description: Hôtel Hor Les Lumières is set in the 11th arr. District in Paris, 800 metres from Place de la République. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Hôtel Hor Les Lumières features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Pompidou Centre is 2.1 km from Hôtel Hor Les Lumières, while Opéra Bastille is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 21 km from Hôtel Hor Les Lumières.

name: Hotel Ducs de Bourgogne
description: A 5-minute walk from The Louvre, this refined hotel offers air-conditioned rooms in the very centre of Paris. Notre Dame Cathedral is 1 km away. The elegant guestrooms at Hotel Ducs de Bourgogne have a Louis Philippe style décor with wooden furniture and luxurious fabrics. They feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a work area with a desk. All rooms are serviced by an elevator. Some rooms are accessible for guests with reduced mobility. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the hotel’s renovated cellar or in guests’ rooms upon request. A room service offering drinks and snacks is also available. The reception area at Hotel Ducs de Bourgogne is open 24 hours a day and offers a concierge service. Free newspapers are available each day in the lobby area. Louvre-Rivoli Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel and offers direct access to the Champs-Elysées and the Arc de Triomphe.

name: Astoria - Astotel
description: Set between Place de Clichy and Rome Metro Stations, the Astoria Opera offers elegant air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access, just a 10 minute walk from the famous Montmartre district and a 15-minute walk from the Champs Elysées Avenue. The rooms are individually decorated with warm colours and modern furnishings. They feature carpeted floor, satellite TV and a hairdryer in each private bathroom. Each room also includes complimentary non-alcoholic beverages in the minibar. A full buffet breakfast is served in the glass-roofed breakfast room, and a continental and à la carte breakfast can also be enjoyed in your room. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. With its cosy lobby with comfy leather sofas, the hotel Astoria Opéra is a stylish place to stay. Additional facilities include 24-hour reception, laundry and dry cleaning.

name: Hotel le Royal Rive Gauche
description: Hôtel le Royal Rive Gauche is located in Paris, a 7-minute walk from Luxembourg Garden. Decorated in a traditional and elegant style, this hotel offers a shared lounge and air-conditioned rooms or suites. The soundproofed rooms and suites at Hôtel le Royal Rive Gauche include a minibar, a safe and a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms are fitted with free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the modern-style breakfast room. All types of restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance. Additional facilities are included such as free Wi-Fi access, luggage storage and an airport shuttle is available at a surcharge. The accommodation has a 24-hour front desk. The hotel is 2 km from Notre-Dame-de-Paris Cathedral, 2.1 km from Louvre Museum and 2.1 km from Orsay Museum. Montparnasse Train Station is 800 metres away and provides direct access to Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre and the Eiffel Tower.

name: Hotel De La Porte Doree
description: Hotel De La Porte Doree is located in Paris, 210 metres from Bois de Vincennes and a 20-minute walk from AccorHotels Arena. It offers classic rooms with parquet flooring and antique furniture. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room is equipped with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and DVD player. Tea and coffee making facilities are also provided. The private bathroom is fitted with a hairdryer and luxury products. All rooms are accessible by a lift. The Porte Doree offers a buffet breakfast, with homemade jams. Guests can relax in the hotel’s lounge with the daily newspapers. The hotel’s front desk is opened 24/7. La Porte Doree has a green policy, using energy saving equipment and recycling programs. Porte Dorée Metro station is 20 metres away, which gives direct to Bastille, Opera and the Eiffel Tower.

name: La Villa Maillot
description: La Villa Maillot is a renovated, 18th-century villa, combining a classic décor and modern design. Located in Paris, it offers a wellness centre, a bar lounge and an indoor, Japanese garden. Porte Maillot Metro Station is 200 metres away. All of the rooms at La Villa Maillot have a unique, colourful décor. Each soundproofed room has a seating area, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. Each room also includes an en suite bathroom with a shower. Every morning you can choose between a continental and a full English breakfast. After breakfast, you can relax with a drink from the bar, by the fireplace. The wellness centre features a sauna, a hammam and a massage room. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property. The Arc de Triomphe is 800 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Recamier
description: Located on Place Saint Sulpice in the heart of Saint Germain des Prés, Hôtel Recamier is a former Bourgeois family home. It offers an elegant lobby with archways and high ceilings. Rooms at Hôtel Recamier are furnished with luxury fabrics and feature large beds with a canopy. Each has an iPod docking station and some have views of the square and Saint Sulpice. Breakfast is served in the pastel-coloured lounge or in the comfort of guest rooms. On warm days, guests can dine on the terrace or relax under the lanterns in the evening. Free tea is served every afternoon from 16:00 to 18:00 in the lounge. Wi-Fi is free throughout the residence and parking is possible at a location nearby. Jardin du Luxembourg is 200 metres from the hotel and Saint-Sulpice Metro Station is 4 minutes away.

name: Hotel B55
description: Set within 3.3 km of Luxembourg Gardens and 4.4 km of Sainte-Chapelle, Hôtel B55 offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Paris. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The hotel features an indoor pool(extra cost 35.00€ per stay), a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some have a private terrace. Guests at Hôtel B55 can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna. Paris Expo - Porte de Versailles is 5 km from Hôtel B55, while Rodin Museum is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly, 12 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service

name: Hotel des Grandes Ecoles
description: Providing free WiFi throughout, Hotel des Grandes Ecoles is set in Paris, in the 5th arr. District. Located around 900 metres from Notre Dame Cathedral, the hotel is also 1.6 km away from Opéra Bastille. Guests can make use of a garden. At the hotel, every room is equipped with a wardrobe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property. The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Pompidou Centre is 1.7 km from Hotel des Grandes Ecoles, while Louvre Museum is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Artus
description: Hôtel Artus is in the heart of Saint Germain des Près on Paris’ chic left bank. It is a boutique hotel offering a sauna and luxury rooms and suites, 1-minute walk from Mabillon Metro Station. Guests can use the sauna. Decorated in soft pastels and bright printed fabrics, accommodation at Artus features an iPod docking station and an LCD TV. The private bathrooms have the added comfort of bathrobes and slippers. Located in the cellar, the modern breakfast room offers a hot and cold buffet every morning. Additional facilities include free Wi-Fi and massages can be booked at the 24-hour reception. Local transport links conveniently lead directly to sights such as Jardin des Plantes and Ile-de-la-Cité. The Seine is a 5-minute walk from the hotel and Cluny’s Medieval Museum is just 700 metres away.

name: Hotel Residence Foch
description: This modern Paris hotel is located within a 10-minute walk of Porte Maillot Metro Station. It offers 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This elegant hotel provides a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and an express check-in and check-out feature. Wi-Fi is also provided. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms provide a mini bar, heating and a flat-screen TV. They all have ironing facilities, a bathtub and a telephone. Paris's attractions, such as Porte Maillot, Palais Des Congres De Paris and Avenue Victor-Hugo, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Residence Foch. Guests can also visit Place Charles de Gaulle and the Arc De Triomphe.Revato

name: Hotel Eiffel Seine
description: This Art Nouveau styled hotel is located beside the River Seine, just a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. Bir-Hakeim Metro Station is directly opposite the hotel and offers easy access to all of Paris’s famous sights, such as the Arc de Triomphe. The air-conditioned rooms are contemporary in style and offer free WiFi. They feature double glazed windows, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Hotel Eiffel Seine also has a bar with a lounge area. A buffet breakfast is either served in the hotel dining room, on the terrace or in guests’ rooms. There is a 24-hour front desk with laundry facilities at the property. All rooms at the Hotel Eiffel Seine are serviced by a lift. The Hotel Eiffel Seine is 800 metres from Jardins du Trocadero and 1.1 km from Musée du quai Branly.

name: Bailli De Suffren
description: This design hotel is located in a residential district, just a 10-minute walk from the famous Eiffel Tower. It offers design rooms decorated with colourful photos of Paris. The modern guest rooms at the Bailli Tour Eiffel are air conditioned and soundproofed. They are each is equipped with free Wi-Fi and a tea and coffee making facilities. A buffet breakfast is served every morning, which can be enjoyed in the breakfast room or in the privacy of the guest rooms. Facilities at the Bailli Tour Eiffel include a lift and a 24-hour reception. There is also a concierge and car hire service. The hotel is just a few steps from the Unesco building and the Necker hospital. It is less than 100 metres from the Ségur Metro stop.

name: Absolute Hotel Paris République
address: 1 Rue de la Fontaine au Roi, 75011 Paris
description: Absolute Hotel is located in Paris, on the edge of the trendy Canal Saint-Martin, 300 metres from Place de la République and 1.5 km from Pompidou Centre. It features a 24hour/7 reception. Serviced by a lift, all rooms include a flat-screen TV. Some have a view of the canal. Absolute Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. A continental breakfast is available daily at a surcharge. All types of restaurants and bars can be found in the area. Opéra Bastille is 2 km from Absolute Hotel, while Notre Dame Cathedral is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: Hotel Le 10 Bis
description: Situated in Paris, Hotel Le 10 BIS offers stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Palais Des Congres De Paris. Guests can also enjoy complimentary wireless internet. The hotel has 23 rooms and has been recently refurbished. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, a coffee maker and a refrigerator. Each one features a flat-screen TV with cable channels, as well as a private bathroom. Hotel Le 10 BIS serves breakfast every morning, and guests are welcome to unwind with a drink in the lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also found in the area. Hotel Le 10 BIS is close to Porte Maillot Metro Station, making it easy for guests to explore Paris and its surrounding areas. Place Charles de Gaulle, Avenue Victor-Hugo and the Arc De Triomphe are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Hôtel Régence Etoile
description: Regence Etoile hotel is located a 3-minute walk from the Champs-Elysées and Arc de Triomphe. It offers elegant, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access. All rooms at Regence Etoile are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and an en suite bathroom or shower room. Some rooms have a balcony or a terrace, and those overlooking Avenue Carnot offer a view of the Arc de Triomphe. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room. Guests may also enjoy drinks in the hotel’s lounge and bar. Regence Etoile offers a concierge service and a 24-hour reception desk. A coach service to Charles de Gaulle Airport is available a 2-minute walk from the hotel. Charles de Gaulle Etoile Metro and Train Station is 280 metres away and offers a direct train link to the business district La Défense, Opera Garnier and Disneyland Paris.

name: 9Hotel Bastille - Lyon
description: 9Hotel Bastille-Lyon is a 5-minute walk from Gare de Lyon and 600 metres from the lively Bastille district. It offers free Wi-Fi access and rooms with satellite TV. Rooms at 9Hotel Bastille-Lyon are decorated in creams and yellows and offer a work desk and a private safe. Each is air-conditioned and also features a private bathroom. Buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel’s breakfast room. Additional facilities include a cold drinks vending machine and luggage storage in the 24-hour reception. Gare de Lyon Metro Station provides direct access to Paris’ sights such as Le Louvre, Avenue Champs Elysées the Marais district. Guests can also walk to Bercy in 15 minutes.

name: Hotel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille
description: Situated just 300 metres from Gare de Lyon TGV Train, RER and Metro Stations in central Paris, this air-conditioned hotel offers a 24-hour reception and ticket service. The soundproofed rooms are equipped with free WiFi access. Each air-conditioned guest room features a flat-screen TV and a desk. All of the rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning while reading the newspapers provided. A vending machine selling drinks is located at reception. Hôtel de France Gare de Lyon Bastille is located just 500 metres from the banks of the River Seine. The trendy nightlife of Bastille is a 10-minute walk away. Public parking is available nearby. Breakfast is served in the breakfast room on the ground floor from 7am to 10.30 am. An "express" breakfast formula including 1 hot drink, 1 fruit juice and 2 viennoiseries is also available (to request to the hotel).

name: Hotel Bloum
description: Villa La Parisienne is a popular choice amongst travelers in Paris, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, mirror, closet can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Paris, Villa La Parisienne will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Pavillon Opera Grands Boulevards
description: Located a 10 minute walk from Galeries Lafayette and Opéra Garnier, this boutique hotel offers heated rooms with a minibar. The Montmartre district is a 20-minute walk away. Guest rooms at Pavillon Opéra Grands Boulevards feature satellite TV and a safety deposit box. Each room has a modern en suite bathroom and is serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in Pavillon Opéra’s breakfast room or in guests’ rooms upon request. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the hotel’s bar with a drink. Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby area of the hotel that is decorated. The reception desk is open 24 hours a day and offers a reservation service for excursions. Metro Stations Grands Boulevards is a 5-minute walk from the hotel and offers direct access to Bastille and The Marais.

name: Hotel le Saint Gregoire
description: This 18th-century building is located in central Paris, just a 20-minute walk from the River Seine and the Louvre. It offers stylish and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. Each guest room at Le Saint Gregoire is soundproofed and has a private bathroom. Some rooms also have a private terrace. Guests can enjoy an evening drink in the hotel bar and a continental breakfast is served every morning. The hotel reception is open 24 hours a day and Wi-Fi access is available. Le Saint Gregoire is just a few steps from the Saint Placide Metro Station and a 5-minute walk from Montparnasse. The Jardin du Luxembourg is just 500 metres away.

name: Hôtel de La Boétie
description: Hotel de la Boétie is located just 300 metres from the famous Avenue Champs Elysées. It offers a 24-hour reception and a modern bar with armchairs and sofas. Rooms at Hotel de la Boétie are individually decorated and offer a TV with satellite channels. Some rooms are interconnecting and all have access to the Wi-Fi connection. An American breakfast is served in the breakfast room every day. Additional facilities include a meeting room and luggage storage in the reception. The hotel is 160 metres from Saint-Philippe-du-Roule Metro Station and 700 metres from George V. They both lead directly to sights such as Le Marais, Le Louvre and Galleries Lafayette department store.

name: Passy Eiffel
description: Passy Eiffel is just 700 metres from Trocadéro, which offers the best views of the Eiffel Tower. It offers 3-star accommodation in one of Paris’ calm and safe streets. Rooms at Passy Eiffel are contemporary in style and offer a minibar and a TV with satellite channels. All are air-conditioned and some have views of the Eiffel Tower. The hotel serves a continental breakfast in the breakfast room or in the guest rooms. Additional facilities include a shuttle service to the airport and major train stations with extra fee. Passy Metro Station is just 250 metres from the hotel and provides direct access to the capital’s sights. The Arc de Triomphe, the Champs Elysées and Montparnasse can be accessed directly.

name: Snob Hotel By Elegancia
description: Snob Hotel by Elegancia offers accommodation in central Paris, a 5-minute walk from Pompidou Centre and a 4-minute walk from Châtelet - Les Halles RER Train Sation and Metro Station. Serviced by a lift, the rooms features air-conditioning and a flat-screen TV. They also have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk and a luggage storage at the property. Louvre Museum is 1.1 km from Snob Hotel by Elegancia, while Notre Dame Cathedral is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 16.5 km from the property.

name: Hotel de Suede Saint Germain
description: Hotel de Suede is a charming hotel in the heart of Paris. It is situated close to the Rodin Museum, the Musée d'Orsay and Saint-Germain-des-Prés. Guest rooms at the Hotel de Suede are air-conditioned. They are equipped with en suite facilities, satellite TV and a work desk. Some have a view of the Matignon private gardens. Breakfast is available daily and served in the peaceful interior garden on nice days. Other services include Wi-Fi, a 24-hour front desk and room service. The Hotel De Suede Saint Germain is close to Metro stops serving lines 10, 12 and 13. Guests are well connected to the rest of the city.

name: Malte - Astotel
description: Located in the historic district in central Paris, the 4-star Hotel Malte - Astotel is only 650 metres from the Louvre Museum. It features an interior courtyard and a 24-hour front desk. The soundproofed guest rooms offer a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free WiFi. Each room also offers a minibar, a courtesy tray and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Guests can also enjoy the lounge with a fireplace. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room and can be enjoyed on the patio at the Hotel Malte - Astotel. Children can play in a dedicated area, where toys are available. Children can play in a dedicated area, where toys are available. Hotel Malte - Astotel is 450 metres from Pyramides Metro Station, providing direct access to Saint-Lazare Train Station. The Opéra Garnier is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Elysees Union Hotel
address: 44 Rue de l Amiral Hamelin, 75116 Paris
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Paris. Those staying at the property can also make use of free Wi-Fi during their stay. This luxury hotel offers family facilities, such as babysitting/child services. The front desk operates 24/7 and the friendly staff can suggest places to visit and provide other tourist information. Hotel Elysees Union features air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV and a coffee maker. They have an en suite bathroom with a private bath or shower and a hair dryer. Elysées Union's restaurant is open for breakfast and is a suitable place for those who want to stay close to everything the property has on offer. Each evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Hotel Elysees Union Paris is close to Trocadero Metro Station, making it easy for guests to discover Paris and its surrounding areas. It is also within walking distance of Seine, the Arc De Triomphe and Place Charles de Gaulle.Revato

name: Hotel Prince Albert Concordia
description: This hotel is located in the centre of Paris, less than a 15-minute walk from the River Seine, Jardin des Plantes, Bastille and AccorHotels Arena. It offers free Wi-Fi access. Each air-conditioned room at the Hôtel Prince Albert Concordia is equipped with satellite channels on a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served daily. Hôtel Prince Albert offers a 24-hour front desk service and an elevator that can take guests to their rooms. A vending machine with fresh beverage is also available. Guest can explore Paris and its sought-after sights by foot or by transport, such as Metro and RER station Gare de Lyon, which is 350 metres from the hotel. A shuttle bus can take guests to Charles de Gaulle Airport upon request.

name: Grand Hotel Dechampaigne
description: The Grand Hotel Dechampaigne is just a 5-minute walk from Le Louvre and the Notre Dame, in central Paris. It offers rooms with Louis XIII-period décor and furniture. Each room at the Dechampaigne is equipped with free Wi-Fi access, a private bathroom with a bathtub or shower and satellite TV. Breakfast is served in the rooms each morning and guests can enjoy gluten-free produce for breakfast upon request. Guests of the Grand Hotel can enjoy a drink in the bar, which features original 16th century furnishings. The hotel also has a souvenir shop and provides a 24-hour reception. Between Rivoli Street and the River Seine, the Dechampaigne Grand Hotel is situated less than 100 metres from Chatelet Metro Station, which provides direct access to Orly Airport and Charles de Gaulle Airport.

name: Padam Hôtel
description: Padam Hôtel has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Paris. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 2.6 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Arc de Triomphe. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Padam Hôtel features some rooms that have a balcony, and all rooms come with a kettle. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. Padam Hôtel offers 4-star accommodation with a hammam. Eiffel Tower is 1.5 km from the hotel, while Musée de l'Orangerie is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 17 km from Padam Hôtel.

name: Hotel Park Lane Paris
description: This 4-star boutique hotel is 750 metres from the Galeries Lafayette department store. Some of the guest rooms feature a private balcony overlooking the city’s rooftops. A flat-screen TV, an iPhone station and a minibar are included in all of the soundproofed and air-conditioned guest rooms. They also feature an espresso coffee machine and includes free WiFi access. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries, bathrobes and a hairdryer. Cocktails are served in the hotel bar, which is open 24 hours a day. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room at Hotel Park Lane Paris, or in guests' room upon request. With a 24-hour reception, the hotel offers a tour desk, a ticket service and a fitness room. Massages are also available. Miromesnil Metro Station is 280 metres away, providing access to the Champs Elysées. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Le Littre
description: Hotel Le Littré is set in Paris, between St Germain des Pres and Montparnasse, 100 metres from Rue de Rennes shopping district. Set in a building originally built in the early 20th century, it offers modern and soundproofed rooms with panoramic views over the city. The air-conditioned rooms and suites are equipped with free WiFi access, double glazed windows, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Bathrobes and slippers are provided in all rooms. Some rooms have a separate living area and a balcony or terrace with views of the capital. The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast with American, gluten-free and continental options in the dining area. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. In addition to a 24-hour reception, Le Littré provides a laundry and dry cleaning service as well as business facilities. All rooms and suites are serviced by 2 lifts. There is also a veranda and a sauna. Saint Placide Metro Station and Montparnasse Train Station is 350 metres from Hotel Le Littré, providing easy access to Paris's many sites such as Saint Michel and Chatelet. A private secured parking is available with an extra charge.

name: Best Western Bretagne Montparnasse
description: The Best Western Bretagne Montparnasse is located on the left bank close to the TGV Atlantic terminal in the heart of the Quartier Montparnasse. Beginning of the century painters lived and worked here. The hotel is located near the city centre, in the Montparnasse area, at the Peripherique Exit Porte Brancion/Porte Vanves/Poste d'Orleans. The Best Western Bretagne Montparnasse, totally renovated to a very high standard offers 45 non-smoking and air-conditioning rooms, 11 of them accommodate either three, four or five people. Special offer for children under 12, please indicate in the comments part of your booking form the number of children traveling with you and their age. We offer special equipment for babies (crib, baby bathtub, warm feeding bottle). Please ask for the equipment at the booking time.bestwestern.com

name: Hôtel Hélios Opéra
description: This eco-friendly hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the Galeries Lafayette department store and the Opéra Garnier. Sacré-Coeur Basilica can be easily reached through Trinité d'Estienne d'Orves Metro Station. Hélios Opéra is entirely non-smoking and offers air-conditioned guest rooms with a design décor. The modern rooms, entirely nonsmoking, are equipped with air-conditioning, free broad band WiFi, laundry service, private safe, minibar, flat-screen TV (satellite and cable), free tea and coffee making facilities. The Deluxe and Executive rooms additionally offer a Nespresso Machine, bathrobe and slippers to the guests. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining room at hotel Hélios Opéra. It features local products, a cheese plate and organic and fair-trade products. After breakfast, guests can use the computer with internet access in the lobby, which features a stained-glass roof. With a 24-hour reception, Hélios Opéra also provides a tour desk and ticket service. The multilingual staff is at your disposal and will be glad to help you to organise your stay in Paris. Chaussée d’Antin – La Fayette Metro Station is 290 metres away, providing direct access to the Louvre Museum and the Champs Elysées. the Eiffel Tower is 3.9 km away.

name: George - Astotel
address: 46, Rue Notre Dame de Lorette, 75009 Paris
description: This hotel is located in Paris’s 9th district, in a typical Parisian building, just 600 metres from the famous Moulin Rouge. It offers air-conditioned rooms which combine a modern yet classic style, a 24-hour reception desk and free Wi-Fi. The contemporary rooms at George Opera are soundproofed and equipped with a telephone, satellite TV and private bathroom with bath or shower. Each room also features a minibar with complimentary non-alcoholic beverages. A breakfast serving hot drinks, pastries, fruit juice, cereal and eggs is available in the form of a buffet each morning. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. George Opera is 140 metres from Saint-Georges Opera (line 12) and 400 metres from Pigalle Metro, which offers direct access to the Champs Elysées. Sacre Coeur and Galeries Lafayette are within walking distance. Parking is possible in the area.

name: Holiday Inn Paris - Gare de Lyon Bastille
description: Holiday Inn® Paris - Gare de Lyon Bastille offers contemporary rooms and suites with ideal for business and leisure travel. Housed in a belle époque building, our central Paris hotel is a five-minute walk from the renowned Gare de Lyon, a major hub for metro and RER trains. Start the day with our breakfast buffet and meet for evening drinks in our buzzy bar and restaurant. Plan a meeting or event in one of our seven venues, including the skylit Opera Room. Walk to iconic Paris attractions such as the grand Opera de Bastille and the Accor Arena. Stroll along the River Seine to the Notre Dame cathedral or take a short train ride to La Défense business district Traveling with family? Kids stay free and we’re only a 35-minute train ride to Disneyland.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Select Hotel - Rive Gauche
description: Located in the heart of the Latin Quarter, in Paris’s lively 5th arrondissement is Select Hotel. Notre Dame Cathedral is 900 metres away. Combining classic architecture and modern design, it provides luxurious accommodation in a peaceful setting. The air-conditioned rooms at the Select Hotel feature WiFi access, en suite facilities and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms overlook the Place de la Sorbonne or the inner courtyard. Guests can enjoy breakfast in the 18th-century vaulted breakfast room before setting off for a day at work or sightseeing in Paris. Later, have afternoon tea with cakes or a relaxing drink in the contemporary bar. Guests can also purchase fast track tickets to attractions such as the Eiffel tower, Palace of Versailles and Disneyland Amusement Park at the hotel's reception upon prior request. The numerous Metro stops surrounding the hotel make Paris’ attractions very accessible. Both Saint Michel Metro Station and Saint Michel Fountain are 600 metres away while Jardin du Luxembourg is a short 3-minute walk away.

name: Be You Luxury Apart'hôtel Paris
description: Set 400 metres from Pigalle Metro Station and 500 metres from La Cigale Concert Hall, BE YOU LUXURY APART'HÔTEL Paris in Paris offers air-conditioned accommodation with views of the city and free WiFi. Featuring a kitchenette with a fridge and kitchenware, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa bed. There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Gare Saint-Lazare, Opéra Garnier and Gare du Nord. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 19 km from BE YOU LUXURY APART'HÔTEL Paris.

name: Hotel Bastille Speria
description: The Speria Hotel is located in the trendy Marais district, between Bastille and the Vosges Squares. It offers 24-hour reception and modern style accommodations with air conditioning and satellite TV. The Bastille Speria provides rooms with en suite facilities, featuring a bathtub and a hairdryer. They have a working area with a desk and a telephone. All rooms are accessible by lift and dry cleaning service is available. A buffet breakfast is at your disposal every morning and can be served in the comfort of your room. You can also relax in the 2 lounge living-room, and enjoy daily newspapers. The multilingual staff welcome you 24/7 and Wi-Fi access is available in the entire Bastille Spéria hotel. Place de la Bastille and its famous opera house are just 350 metres from the hotel. You can also walk to the town hall and the Georges Pompidou centre in 20 minutes. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hotel Whistler
description: Hotel Whistler is located in the 10th arrondissement of Paris, 1.2 km from La Cigale Concert Hall and in between Gare du Nord and Gare de l'Est train stations. Hotel Whistler features free WiFi throughout the property. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some private bathrooms are fitted with a bath. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and slippers. A continental breakfast is served every morning for an extra fee. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. For a supplement and subject to availability, guests can privatise the hammam between 08:00 and 20:00. Sacré-Coeur is 1.3 km from Hotel Whistler, while Place de la République is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Le Petit Oberkampf Hotel & Spa
description: Welcome to the Hotel Beaumarchais! Our hotel is situated at the edge of the historic and cultural district of the Marais, just a stone's throw from the famous Place des Vosges and the local art galleries and museums. The bustling rue Oberkampf offers a lively environment with its typically Parisian cafés, bars and restaurants.WIHP

name: Victoire & Germain
description: The Victoire & Germain hotel is located in the Saint-Germain area of Paris, 1 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral and 1.2 km from the Louvre Museum. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel and there is a 24-hour front desk. Every room in the hotel features air conditioning and soundproofing, as well as a flat-screen TV and coffee machine. All bathrooms have a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Rooms are decorated in a contemporary style. Breakfast is available at Victoire & Germain. Several restaurants and cafés are located within a few minutes’ walk of the hotel. This hotel is situated 260 metres from Odéon Metro Station. Orly Airport is located a 30-minute drive away and Charles de Gaulle Airport is 40 minutes’ drive from the hotel. Paid public parking is available.

name: Monterosa - Astotel
description: The Monterosa is located a 10-minute walk from the Galeries Lafayette and a 5-minute walk from the Sacré-Cœur Basilica in Montmartre. It offers contemporary guest rooms with free Wi-Fi. Each of the soundproofed guest rooms at the Monterosa has a different colour scheme, and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each room includes complimentary non-alcoholic beverages in the minibar. and all rooms are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the bright breakfast room, and guests can relax on the flower-filled patio. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. The Monterosa hotel is a 2-minute walk from the Moulin Rouge. The Saint George Metro station is 200 metres away, giving access to all of Paris.

name: Amastan Paris
description: Offering a terrace and views of the garden, Amastan Paris is located in Paris, a 5-minute walk from the Champs Elysées, Franklin D. Roosevelt Metro Station and Avenue Montaigne. Amastan Paris features free WiFi, a library and a 24 hour reception. Guests can enjoy a selection of drinks including cocktails and light snacks made with fresh produce under the glass roof of the hotel's bar, Anouk. Serviced by a lift, the air-conditioned, contemporary rooms include a coffee machine, an iPod dock and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The rooms also feature a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms also have a private balcony. A clothes rack can be provided upon request. Breakfast is served daily and can be served in the room. The hotel is only a 3-minute walk from Saint-Philippe du Roule Metro Station and a 5-minute drive from Arc de Triomphe and Opera Garnier. The Grand Palais and Petit Palais are 800 metres away, while Tuileries Garden is 1.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Opéra Richepanse
address: 14, Rue Du Chevalier De Saint George, 75001 Paris
description: Hotel Opéra Richepanse is a boutique hotel in central Paris, a 5-minute walk from Place de la Concorde and the Champs Elysées. The luxury shops on rue Saint-Honoré are 50 metres away. The large, modern rooms each have a flat-screen TV, lighting control system device, music in the private bathroom and a bath or a walk-in shower. Each one also includes air-conditioning and facilities for making tea and coffee, while some also offer views of Madeleine Church. Free WiFi access is available. The hotel provides a full buffet breakfast every morning, served either in the 17th-century dining room or in the comfort of the guest rooms. Daily newspapers are provided. The reception features a marble floor and is open 24 hours. The multilingual staff will be happy to help you organise your stay in Paris. It is 50 metres from Madeleine Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from the Tuileries Gardens, Opéra Garnier and Place de la Vendome. You may also choose to visit the Louvre Museum, which is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Best Western Allegro Nation
address: 33, Avenue du Docteur Arnold Netter, 75012 Paris
description: Enjoy your stay in Paris at the Best Western Allegro Nation, a four star hotel, situated in eastern Paris near the Palais Omnisport of Bercy. The hotel is also near the Bastille Opera House and the Francois Mitterrand national library. Each of the hotel's 49 bedrooms is equipped with a bath, satellite television, direct dial telephone and Wi-Fi. And of course, the Best Western Allegro Nation is fully air-conditioned and has private parking. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Sonder Quintinie
description: Featuring free WiFi, Hôtel Résidence Quintinie Square offers self-catering accommodation in Paris. Paris Expo - Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre is 1.5 km from the property and the Pasteur Institute is a 5-minute walk away. Each of the tastefully decorated studios is fitted with wooden floors, large windows and comfortable bedding. A kitchenette, equipped with a microwave and refrigerator is at your disposal. A stovetop is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Bed linen is available. Eiffel Tower is 2.3 km from Hôtel Résidence Quintinie Square, while Orsay Museum is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Orly Airport, 13 km from the property. The hotel also provides free parking for bikes in the courtyard, subject to availability.

name: Hotel at Gare du Nord
description: This hotel is located in central Paris, next to Gare du Nord. The hotel has a 24 hour reception and guestrooms with lift access, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The Hotel de l'Aqueduc offers a buffet breakfast and the reception provides daily newspapers. The Gare du Nord and Gare de l’Est are situated next to the hotel. They offer metro, rail and Eurostar links throughout Paris and beyond. The Canal Saint-Martin is just 400 metres from the Hotel de l'Aqueduc and Montmartre is 1 km away. Guests can take the RER direct to Parc des Expositions de Villepinte in 30 minutes.

name: Mom'Art Hotel
description: Maison Mom'Art is conveniently located in the popular 18th - Sacre Coeur - Montmartre area. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, postal service, taxi service, ticket service, wheelchair accessible are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Enjoy the fitness center, sauna, massage before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Maison Mom'Art.Agoda

name: Hôtel & Spa Saint Jacques
description: Hotel Saint Jacques offers comfortable en suite accommodation in the heart of Paris’ Latin Quarter. It is near Ile de la Cite and Notre Dame Cathedral. Each Hotel Saint Jacques room is soundproofed and equipped with a private bathroom and satellite TV. Guests are invited to relax with a glass of wine in the hotel’s Toulouse Lautrec lounge. The lounge features a collection of 18th and 19th-century books that guests can leaf through. There are a variety of dining options near the hotel. Staff can organise excursions for you or reserve restaurants on request. Massage treatments and transfers can also be arranged. Saint Jacques’ location makes it an ideal base for exploring Paris. It is just 1 minute on foot from the Maubert–Mutualite Metro (line 10) and Boulevard Saint-Germain. The Gallo-Roman amphitheater, Arenes de Lutece, is 600 metres away. A public parking is available within a 5-minute walk from the property.

name: Le Grey hotel
description: Located halfway between the Opéra Garnier and Montmartre, Le Grey Hôtel is a boutique hotel offering stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi access and an LCD TV. It provides luggage storage and it has a 24-hour reception. Serviced by a lift, all of the air-conditioned rooms feature contemporary décor and have a bathroom with rain shower or bathtub and free toiletries. They are non-smoking and soundproofed, and include a safety deposit box and minibar. A continental buffet breakfast is served in the morning and the hotel has a lounge and a bar. Complimentary tea, coffee and snacks are available throughout the day. Room service is available and a wide range of brasseries and restaurants can be found in the surrounding area. The Grands Magasins department stores are a 20-minute walk away. Liège Metro Station, 100 metres away, provides access to the Champs Elysées and the Opéra Garnier in 15 minutes. Saint-Lazare Train Station is 500 metres away.

name: Hôtel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
description: The Saint-Paul Rive-Gauche is located between the Sorbonne and the Luxembourg Gardens on Paris’s Left Bank. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed guest rooms with flat-screen TV and free WiFi access. Guests of the Rive-Gauche can relax in the shared living area, with an open fireplace. The Saint-Paul serves a buffet breakfast in the hotel's 17th-century arched cellar. Room service offers a choice of hot drinks. The hotel is situated in the Latin Quarter, 350 metres from boutiques and cafés on Saint Germain Boulevard. Odeon Metro Station is a 5-minute walk from the hotel and gives direct access to Montparnasse and Chatelet.

name: Suites & Hotel Helzear Champs-Elysees
description: Located in Paris, Suites Helzear Champs Elysées is a 6-minute walk from the Arc de Triomphe and a 22-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. It offers a 24-hour front desk and and self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Apartments and studios are spread over six floors and are serviced by a lift. They feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a bathroom with bath or shower. A refrigerator, a Nespresso coffee machine and a microwave are provided in each accommodation type. There is also a stove, a minibar and kitchenware. Suites Helzear Champs Elysées is a 3-minute walk from the Champs-Elysées Avenue and 650 metres from the Seine River. George V Avenue is a 3-minute walk away. An airport shuttle service can be arranged at an extra cost.

name: Le Tourville Eiffel
description: Le Tourville Eiffel offers charming accommodation with a neo-classic décor, just a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. The hotel’s bar is a good place to relax after a long day of work or sightseeing. Guest rooms are air-conditioned, individually decorated and feature a flat-screen satellite TV with international channels. Some have a private terrace and the suites have a spa bath. All rooms provide bathrobes and slippers. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge and there is also the option to have a take-away breakfast. You can access sights such as Place de la Concorde directly from Ecole Militaire Metro Station (Line 8), 250 metres away.

name: Montfleuri Hotel
address: 21, Avenue de la Grande Armée, 75116 Paris
description: Located in the chic 16th district, this boutique hotel is 500 metres from the famous Champs Elysées and 800 metres from Porte Maillot and its Palais des Congrès. All air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi access and a minibar. Each classic room features a dressing room and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at hotel Montfleuri. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar, while using the free Wi-Fi access. Dinners in jars are available for room service. With a 24-hour reception, the Montfleuri also provides a concierge service on site. Charles de Gaulle-Etoile Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away, and provides access to the Louvre Museum.

name: Hotel Alize Grenelle
description: Located in central Paris, this hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. It features a 24-hour reception and offers modern rooms with a TV and Wi-Fi access. Beaugrenelle Shopping Centre is a 2-minute walk away. Guest rooms are equipped with a trouser press and an alarm clock. Each room have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by a lift at hotel Alizé Grenelle. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. Breakfast can be served to your room upon request. Alizé Grenelle Tour Eiffel is just 50 metres from Charles Michels Metro Station, providing access to the Latin Quarter. Private parking is available 50 metres from the hotel with an additional cost and upon prior reservation.

name: Joke - Astotel
description: Located in the 9th district of Paris, just a 3-minute walk from the Moulin Rouge, Hotel Joke – Astotel offers a 24-hour front desk, concierge service and free WiFi access throughout. Blanche Metro Station is 190 metres away and offers direct access to the Arc de Triomphe. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box and all rooms include complimentary non-alcoholic beverages in the minibar. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A breakfast is available each morning at Hotel Joke – Astotel and it can be served in the comfort of your own room. Room service is also provided and restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the hotel. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. Additional features include luggage storage, an airport shuttle service and currency exchange. The Montmartre district is a 10-minute walk away and Saint-Lazare Train Station is 1 km from the property.

name: Joyce - Astotel
description: The Joyce Hotel is located in the heart of Paris, a 15-minute walk from the Opera Garnier. It offers comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi Internet access. All of the rooms are air-conditioned and soundproofed, organic toiletries and satellite TV. Each room also features a minibar with complimentary non-alcoholic beverages. The lounge under the glass roof provides a naturally-lit environment to relax in. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. Hotel Joyce is located a 20-minute walk from the Montmartre area. In the opposite direction you will find Gare Saint-Lazare a 10-minute walk away, with numerous Metro lines that offer easy access around the French Capital.

name: Hotel Flanelles Paris
description: Boasting a bar and a spa and wellness centre, Maison ELLE Paris is set in Paris, 600 metres from Arc de Triomphe and 1.4 km from Palais des Congrès de Paris. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel offers a sauna and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Maison ELLE Paris all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. Eiffel Tower is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Gare Saint-Lazare is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 23 km from Maison ELLE Paris.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Sydney Opera
description: Situated in the heart of the business area, within walking distance of the Opera house, the Madeleine Church and the Concorde Place, the Best Western Plus® Hotel Sydney Opera has a preferred location between Hausmann Department Stores and luxurious shops of the Fauborg Saint Honore. The hotel offers 36 rooms in a Napoleon III-style building with all modern equipment. They were all recently renovated. Free Wi-Fi access is available in rooms and public areas. Croissants and home-made pastries will help you start a good day. You have direct access to public transportation (subway, Paris RER, etc.) to go to the business district of La Defense, Paris Expo Porte de Versailles, to reach Gare du Nord or to have fun at Disneyland® Paris.bestwestern.com

name: Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert
description: Located in Paris, Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert is 1.5 km from Sacré-Coeur.
