The accommodation is a member of the Hostelling International Network and offers a restaurant, bar, shared lounge, evening entertainment, shared kitchen, terrace and 24-hour front desk. At the hostel each room has a wardrobe and a private shower. A continental breakfast is available daily at Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert. La Cigale Concert Hall is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Opéra Garnier is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert.

name: Hôtel Orphée - Orso hotel
description: This 3-star hotel is located 800 metres from the Museum of Natural History and the Jardin des Plantes. It offers free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception, just 50 metres from Saint-Marcel Metro Station. The guest rooms at Hotel Orphée - Orso Hotels have an LCD TV with satellite channels. All rooms are air-conditioned and some have a private balcony. You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the breakfast room every morning. There is also the option to take a continental breakfast in the comfort of your room. The River Seine is 600 metres from the hotel and Austerlitz Train Station is 400 metres away. You can also use local transport to access the Lively Place de la République or the Sorbonne directly.

name: Maxim Opéra
description: Set a 10-minute walk from the luxury Galeries Lafayette department store, this 4-star hotel offers an on-site bar and free WiFi access. Cadet Metro Station is 200 metres from Hôtel Maxim Opéra and provides access to the Louvre. The rooms at Hôtel Maxim Opéra are decorated in stone-coloured tones and have an LCD TV with satellite channels. Each one also features a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. A courtesy tray is at your disposal. You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the breakfast room or in the comfort of your guestroom. Newspapers, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception are just some of the other hotel facilities. Paris’ other sights, such as the Opéra Garnier and the chic Place Vendome are a 10-minute walk from the property. If you are arriving by train, both Gare du Nord and Gare de l’Est are a 20-minute walk away. Grands Boulevards Metro Station is 400 metres away and gives direct access to the Eiffel Tower and Champs Elysees.

name: Hotel Sookie
description: Attractively located in Paris, HOTEL SOOKIE features a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.3 km from Pompidou Centre. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at HOTEL SOOKIE have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms have a seating area. The rooms have a safety deposit box. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Gare de l'Est, Opéra Bastille and Notre Dame Cathedral. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 17 km from HOTEL SOOKIE.

name: Timhotel Montmartre
description: Montmartre, is the unique charm of a Paris made of History and of myths. The Timhotel Montmartre will immerse you into the heart of a universe inhabited by the painters, the artists, the cabarets and the good traditional tables, with for good measure, an extraordinary view over the roofs of the Capital. For a magical stay with an exceptional value for money, let yourself be tempted!Located in a quiet small street laid with cobblestones open onto a small square full of charm, famous for its Bateau-Lavoir, the Timhotel Montmartre welcomes you 24H/24 in seven languages, in an adorable classic building whose front as been renovated. The soundproof and air-conditioned rooms, the top of the range bedding, the buffet breakfast will make your stay unforgettable in this charming hotel. Many rooms propose a unique view of the Capital. Montmartre, is the highest point of Paris (130m). Ideally located to take you immediately into the mythical Paris of Montmartre, the Timhotel Montmartre will offer you an especially warm, tailor made welcome.iHotelier/iStay

name: Crystal Hotel
description: Crystal Hotel is located in the heart of Saint-Germain, just around the corner from the famous Café des Deux Magots. It offers colourful rooms equipped with a minibar and a safe. The non-smoking rooms at Crystal Hotel are air-conditioned and feature a TV with satellite channels. Each also has free Wi-Fi access and a private bathroom with amenities and a bath. Breakfast is served in the vaulted cellar or in the comfort of guest rooms. Additional hotel facilities include a 24-hour reception where guests can relax in the armchairs and admire the large mural. The Medieval Museum can be reached in a 10-minute walk and Jardin du Luxembourg is just 650 metres away. Saint-Germain-des-Près Metro Station provides direct access to Notre Dame Cathedral.

name: Hotel de L'Esperance
description: Located a 2-minute walk from the lively rue Mouffetard in Paris, Hotel de L'Esperance offers an inner courtyard. Place Monge and the Latin district are a 10-minute's walk away. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. Every air conditioned room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and comes with a private bathroom with bath or shower. There is a 24-hour front desk, a luggage room and concierge service at Hotel de L'Esperance. Vending machines for snacks and drinks are also featured. The hotel also offers car hire. Censier Daubenton Metro Station is 350 metres from the property, providing access to central Paris within 20 minutes by public transport. The lively Buttes aux Cailles neighborhood is 1.5 km away.

name: Hotel Saint Marcel
description: Featuring free WiFi, Hôtel Saint Marcel offers accommodation in Paris, 1.9 km from AccorHotels Arena. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and get some exercise in the fitness room. Rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms have a seating area where you can relax. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer in the bathroom. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Notre Dame Cathedral is 2 km from Hôtel Saint Marcel, while Opéra Bastille is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Orly Airport, 12 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Clairefontaine
description: Hôtel Clairefontaine is located just a 5-minute walk from Montparnasse and Denfert-Rochereau Metro Stations, which give direct access to the Champs Elysées, Montmarte, Notre Dame and Eiffel Tower. The hotel offers a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and laundry services. All the contemporary rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk, safety deposit box, air conditioning, wardrobe and a private bathroom with a shower. The hotel offers both a buffet breakfast, which can be served to guest rooms. You can also dine on the terrace in the garden while browsing the free Wi-Fi and daily newspapers. A large range of bars and restaurants can be found in the area. The property is also ideally located a 5-minute walk from Montparnasse-Bienvenüe Train Station. Guests have a choice of 2 paid parking areas at Vinci Montparnasse and Vinci Gaîté. Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre is 5 km away. A public shuttle service is available for guests using Orly Airport. It leaves from Denfert Rochereau Square, which is a 5-minute walk away. Denfert Rochereau Metro Station also offers direct access to Charles de Gaulle Airport and the Latin Quarter. A public shuttle service is available with extra charges

name: Hotel Louison
description: Hotel Louison is located in central Paris, 500 metres from the Montparnasse Bienvenüe Metro (lines 4, 6, 12 and 13). Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Eco-label certified, the hotel has soundproofed and air-conditioned rooms with lift access and satellite TV. Among our eco-responsible commitments, we chose to offer a homemade breakfast buffet with local and seasonal products. Every evening, a homemade aperitif with a selection of drinks and appetizers is available free of charge in the dining room. The hotel is 800 metres from the Bon Marche and 1.3 km from Saint-Germain-des-Prés. From the Montparnasse Bienvenüe Metro, guests can quickly access the rest of central Paris.

name: Residhome Paris Rosa Parks
description: Located in Paris, Residhome Paris Rosa Parks is an easy drive from the Musee du Louvre and Seine. Those staying at the property can also take advantage of free Wi-Fi during their stay. Apartments are air-conditioned and feature top-of-the-range amenities such as slippers, a flat-screen TV and a coffee maker. For guests who wish to cook their own meals, there is a kitchenette that is conveniently equipped with kitchenware, a dishwasher and a refrigerator. Those staying at the property can enjoy a varied breakfast, which is available each morning. Residhome Paris Rosa Parks is within walking distance of Parc de la Villette and Place de l Argonne. Eiffel Tower is just a short car ride from the property.Revato

name: Mercure Paris Place D'italie
description: Located in the heart of a quintessential Parisian suburb in the 13th arrondissement, Mercure Paris Place d'Italie immerses you in a world of haute couture with its fashion-inspired decor and display of designer gowns. In this completely renovated hotel are a meeting room and elegant guest accommodation, including four family rooms and Privilege rooms with views of the Eiffel Tower. Each morning, we are pleased to serve a delicious breakfast featuring regional fare from a small market nearby.accorhotels.com

name: Monceau Elysees
description: Located in the 17th district of Paris, this 3-star hotel is just 350 metres from Monceau Park. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. Public parking is available nearby. The modern guest rooms at Monceau Elysées are individually decorated. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and minibar. Each room has a private bathroom including a hairdryer. Most of the rooms are accessible by lift. Monceau Elysées serves a buffet breakfast each morning in the breakfast room. Guests can also have breakfast in the comfort of the guest room while reading the newspapers provided. Public parking is available in the area at an extra cost. With a 24-hour reception, additional services on site include car rental and dry cleaning. Monceau Elysées is 100 metres from Courcelles Metro Station and 600 metres from Wagram Metro Station. The Arc de Triomphe and Champs Elysées are within walking distance.

name: Hotel Moderniste
description: Located in a beautiful and very quiet "bourgeois street" in the 15th arrondissement of Paris, in the heart of the Convention district and very close to the Porte de Versailles Exhibition Center, the Hotel Moderniste opens its doors after a complete renovation. This brand new 4-star boutique hotel is a beautiful example of 1930s architecture in Paris and immerses us in the avant-garde atmosphere of this resolutely modern era. Structured on 7 floors, the Hotel Moderniste offers 40 very comfortable rooms in a resolutely modern decor Particular attention has been paid to the bedding and soundproofing of each room to ensure optimal sleep in the heart of the capital.

name: Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon
description: Located in Paris and within 1.8 km of Opéra Bastille, Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon features a bar, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is set 1.2 km from Paris-Gare-de-Lyon, 3.6 km from Notre Dame Cathedral and 3.7 km from Pompidou Centre. The hotel has family rooms. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are fitted with a seating area. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet, continental or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French. Sainte-Chapelle is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Luxembourg Gardens is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 16 km from Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon.

name: Arc De Triomphe Hotel
address: 10 Rue De L'Arc De Triomphe, 75017 Paris
description: The Hotel Arc De Triomphe is located in Paris 300 metres from the Étoile and Avenue des Champs-Elysées. It has air-conditioned rooms with lift access, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Guests of the Arc De Triomphe can enjoy a buffet breakfast, in the dining room. The Arc De Triomphe offers a 24-hour reception and public parking is available nearby at an extra cost. From Charles de Gaulle – Étoile RER and Metro guests can quickly access La Défense, Louvre – Rivoli Metro and central Paris.

name: Hotel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber
description: Set in a quiet and privileged district, Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber is walking distance from the Champs Elysées and Trocadero Square, and a 3-minute walk from Victor Hugo metro station. Boissière metro station on line 6 is a 5-minute walk away. In a Parisian building, Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber offers air-conditioned rooms equipped with a desk, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms comes with a bathroom fitted with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries. You can glance through the novels of Victor Hugo in the library and enjoy breakfast in the inner garden at an extra charge. There is a 24-hour front desk as well as facilities for disabled guests available at this property. The Eiffel Tower is 20 minutes away by public transport, while Palais des Congrès Convention Center is 15 minutes away from Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber.

name: Le Matissia
description: Set 700 metres from Gare du Nord and less than 1 km from Gare de l'Est, LE MATISSIA in Paris offers air-conditioned accommodation with views of the city and free WiFi. Featuring a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near LE MATISSIA include Pigalle Metro Station, La Cigale Concert Hall and Opéra Garnier. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Gerando
description: Hotel Gérando is located in the Montmartre area in Paris. The hotel features a 24-hour reception, a luggage storage and free WiFi. The soundproofed rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. All rooms are also serviced by a lift. The Gérando’s continental breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of your room. Restaurant and bars can be found within walking distance. Hotel Gérando is a 2-minute walk from Anvers Metro Station, a 10-minute walk from Sacré-Cœur Basilica and a 14-minute walk from the Moulin Rouge.

name: Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel
description: Located in the 2nd district of Paris, just 150 metres from Réamur-Sébastopol Metro Station, 123 Sébastopol offers a terrace, 24-hour reception and luggage storage. Place de la République is only a 10-minute walk away. With a cinema-inspired décor, all rooms are air-conditioned and has a flat-screen TV, a minibar with free soft drinks. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer. Each floor pays tribute to a specific cinema artist and each room includes complimentary non-alcoholic beverages in the minibar. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at 123 Sébastopol and it can also be enjoyed in the comfort of your own room. Restaurants can be found within walking distance. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. Additional features include free Wi-Fi access throughout, an elevator and daily newspapers are available for free. Les Halles Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away and the Louvre Museum is 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: Sonder L'Edmond Parc Monceau
description: Located in Paris, 700 metres from Parc Monceau, this hotel has air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi and a fully equipped kitchen. Each room and suite at the L' Edmond has a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some rooms have a furnished terrace. A buffet breakfast is available daily for purchase in the communal lounge. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. Villiers Metro Station is 250 metres from the hotel, providing direct access to Opera or the Pere Lachaise Cemetery. Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysees is 1.9 km away, Sacre Coeur and the Montmartre district is 3.4 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel de Banville
description: This hotel is just a 15-minute walk from the Champs-Elysées and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi access. Each guest room has a private bathroom and some rooms offer a balcony or an Eiffel Tower view. They are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A breakfast buffet with homemade pastries is served daily in the lobby area. Guests can also relax by the fireplace in the bar. Hôtel de Banville is a 2-minute walk from the restaurants at Place du Maréchal-Juin and close to the Porte Maillot Convention Centre and Espace Champerret. Porte de Champerret Metro Station is 100 metres away. Private airport transfers can be organised at the 24-hour reception.

name: Hotel Régina Opéra Grands Boulevards
description: Hôtel Regina Opéra Grands Boulevards is located in central Paris in the lively Grands Boulevards district, near theatres, concert halls. The Regina is a 10-minute walk from Canal Saint-Martin and just a 3-minute walk from Bonne Nouvelle Metro Station, which offers direct access to Place de la Concorde and the Eiffel Tower. The modern, air-conditioned rooms are decorated in warm colours and feature a satellite TV, free WiFi access and soundproofing. They also have a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast offering fresh products is served each morning in the bright breakfast room. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the bar. Hotel Regina offers a 24-hour reception and free newspapers, as well as a laundry and a dry cleaning service. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance. Guests can also easily visit the Marais district and Le Louvre is a short Metro ride away.

name: Hotel du College de France
description: Located in Paris, Hotel du College de France is 210 metres from La Sorbonne University and 500 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral. This hotel offers free WiFi and a communal lounge with a TV. All rooms are heated and feature a fan, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bathroom is fitted with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at Hotel du College de France. This property is a 7-minute walk from the Pantheon and a 12-minute walk from the Luxembourg Gardens. Cluny-La Sorbonne Metro Station is 250 metres away.

name: Hotel Terre Neuve
address: 22 B Rue de Terre Neuve, 75020 Paris
description: Hotel Terre Neuve offers accommodation in Paris, 1.2 km from Père Lachaise Cemetery and 2.8 km from Bastille. Free WiFi access is provided. All rooms features tea and coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV. They have a private bathroom fitted with a walk-shower and a hairdryer. A continental buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Jardin des Plantes is 3.8 km from Hotel Terre Neuve, while Place de la République is 2.9 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 14 km away.

name: Hôtel De Buci
description: This classical style, 4-star hotel is located in the Saint Germain area of Paris. Hôtel De Buci offers luxuriously decorated rooms with antique furnishings in the heart of the Latin Quarter. The soundproofed guest rooms at Hôtel De Buci have a typical Parisian charm with their velvet curtains and antique wooden furniture. Each room features Cable TV and a minibar. The Hôtel De Buci serves a buffet breakfast daily in the elegant breakfast room, and the hotel also features a 24-hour bar. Guests can visit the most famous sights of Paris easily, such as the Louvre and the Luxembourg Gardens, both of which are less than 10 minutes by foot from the hotel. There is also a concierge service for guests needing travel information.

name: Avia Saphir Montparnasse
description: Located a 10-minute walk from Gare Montparnasse-Bienvenue and a 20-minute walk from Jardin du Luxembourg, Avia Hôtel Saphir Montparnasse has a 24-hour reception. All rooms include a satellite TV and free WiFi access. The heated rooms at Avia Hôtel Saphir Montparnasse have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe is free of charge and a minibar is available at a surcharge and upon request. A continental breakfast is available daily and can be brought to the comfort of your room. All types of restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance. The hotel is situated 37 metres from Pasteur metro Station which provides direct access to Charles de Gaulle Etoile and La Madeleine. Champs de Mars and its Tour Eiffel are a 25-minute walk away.

name: Kyriad Paris 13 - Italie Gobelins
description: Kyriad Hotel XIII Italie Gobelins is located in the 13th arrondissement of Paris. It offers en suite rooms with Wi-Fi access just 100 metres from Gobelins Metro Station. The rooms at the Kyriad have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe and tea and coffee making facilities. Each has a private bathroom with a bath or shower and some rooms have a balcony. Fresh croissants are served on the hotel’s breakfast buffet every morning. A drinks machine is also available in the 24-hour reception area. Other facilities include a newspaper ordering service. Kyriad Hotel XIII Italie Gobelins is a 10-minute walk from Jardin des Plantes. The local metro station provides direct access to Paris’ sights including Le Louvre, Opéra and the city’s centre, Châtelet. AccorHotels Arena is located 2 km from the property.

name: Au Manoir Saint Germain
description: The Manoir Saint Germain is located next to the Saint-Germain-des-Prés Metro Station. This 4-star hotel overlooks the Deux Magots café and offers soundproofed accommodation with free internet access. Each guest room at the Manoir Saint Germain has a traditional décor with woodwork beds. They are also equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and air conditioning. Some rooms have a view of the Saint-Germain-des-Prés Church and the Deux Magots café. A breakfast buffet is served daily and guests can relax in the bar or on the patio. The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception with a tour desk. Au Manoir Saint Germain is just a 15-minute walk from the Musée d’Orsay and Le Louvre. The hotel is a short Metro ride from the Champs Elysées and the Eiffel Tower. Luxembourg Gardens are 750 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel de l'Abbaye
description: Ideally located in the centre of Paris, Hôtel de l'Abbaye offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. With a private bathroom fitted with a bath and a hairdryer, some units at Hôtel de l'Abbaye also have a terrace. At the accommodation all rooms include a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Guests at Hôtel de l'Abbaye can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Luxembourg Gardens, Rodin Museum and Orsay Museum. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from Hôtel de l'Abbaye.

name: Hôtel Belloy Saint-Germain
description: Hôtel Belloy Saint Germain is located in the historic Saint Germain district, near the Luxembourg Gardens and Notre Dame Cathedral. It offers modern air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi, satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. Rooms are accessible by a lift. The restaurant provides a buffet breakfast served in the classy dining area. Guests can enjoy a drink from the hotel’s honesty bar. This hotel’s central location allows guests to explore the nearby areas such as the lively Saint-Michel and Odeon. Metro Cluny – La Sorbonne is 270 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to famous sites such as the Eiffel Tower and Jardin des Plantes.

name: Hôtel Du Bois Champs-Elysées
description: The 3-star Hotel du Bois offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Paris. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, convenience store, daily housekeeping, taxi service. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, closet, separate living room, internet access wireless. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Paris has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Hotel du Bois.priceline.com

name: Hotel Le Chat Noir
description: Situated in Paris, Hotel Le Chat Noir offers stylish, 4-star accommodation close to the Moulin Rouge. It is moments from Pigalle, eateries and nightlife options. The hotel has 39 rooms and has been recently refurbished. Guests are able to enjoy a book in the on-site library. The rooms are air conditioned and include bottled water, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. They are also equipped with a hair dryer, an alarm clock and cable/satellite channels. Paris's attractions, such as Montmartre Cemetery and Place de Clichy, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Le Chat Noir. Guests can also visit Montmartre and the Musee de Montmarte.Revato

name: Art Hotel Eiffel
description: Art Hotel Eiffel is located in the 15th district in Paris, just 1 km from the Eiffel Tower and 600 metres from La Motte-Picquet Metro Station. The contemporary rooms have a flat-screen TV and free wireless internet. Each of the air-conditioned rooms has a desk, while some rooms offer a view of the Eiffel Tower. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bath or shower and include a hairdryer. With a 24-hour front desk, this hotel also provides room service and luggage storage. The Champs Elysées Avenue is 3 km from this hotel and Montparnasse Train Station is 15 minutes away by metro.

name: Hotel Tilsitt Etoile
description: The hotel is situated in quiet and typically paved Parisian street 350 metres from the Arc de Triomphe and a 5-minute walk from Avenue Champs Elysées. It offers rooms under the mansard on the sixth floor that overlook the rooftops of Paris. All of the rooms offer free high-speed WiFi internet access. At the Tilsitt Etoile,breakfast is served in the winter garden which features a patio and a fountain. Gluten free breakfast is available upon request. Guests can enjoy coffee facilities at the bar from 11:00. Place de l'Etoile is just 200 metres away leading to Place de la Concorde and Musée du Louvre. The Eiffel Tower is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Cluny Square
description: Located in the lively Latin Quarter, this hotel offers elegant guest rooms equipped with a TV, some with a balcony. It is 110 metres from Cluny - La Sorbonne Metro and RER B Station. All soundproofed guest rooms feature a minibar and a refined décor. Some have views over the park or the Eiffel Tower. Private bathrooms include a bath or shower, towel dryer and hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:00 until 11:00 in the lounge area at Cluny Square hotel. After breakfast, guests can use the free Wi-Fi access, which is provided throughout the property. With a 24-hour reception, Cluny Square hotel also provides a ticket service and dry cleaning. Luxembourg Garden is 500 metres from the hotel and Notre-Dame Cathedral is a 7-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Trema
description: Featuring free WiFi, Hotel Trema offers accommodation in Paris, 3.9 km from Sacré-Coeur and 120 metres from Crimée Metro Station. The property is also a 4-minute walk from the Bassin de la Villette, which features 3 free outdoor pools open from mid-June to mid-September and activities such as water sports and cruises. Rooms are soundproofed, and come with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. Each has its own private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Place de la République is 3.6 km from Hotel Trema, while Pompidou Centre is 5.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Charles De Gaulle Airport, 26.3 km from Hotel Trema. Les Docks de Paris Event Venue are 2.3 km away.

name: Hotel Square
description: Hotel Square is a 5-star boutique hotel in Paris, opposite the Eiffel Tower. It offers elegant rooms and suites with air-conditioning, flat-screen TV with international channels and free Wi-Fi. Beaugrenelle Shopping Centre is a 7-minute walk away and Rue de Passy is 1 km from the hotel. The guestrooms and suites also offer elegant marble bathrooms with bathtub and shower. A Hi-Fi stereo with a CD player, minibar and work desk can also be found in the rooms. There are 2 lounge areas in the Square where guests can relax in front of a large, plasma-screen TV with cable channels. Upon advanced request, the lounges can be used for private receptions. Spa Nuxe is 200m² and offers a variety of well-being and relaxation treatments including massage, a range of beauty treatments and much more. The nearest metro stations are Javel Metro Station, an 11-minute walk from Hotel Square and Passy Metro Station, 14 minutes' walk from the property. RER train station Avenue du Président Kennedy is a 5-minute walk from the property. The hotel has its own parking garage.

name: Hotel Eiffel Capitol
description: Located on a quiet street on the left bank, this hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. It offers modern guest rooms with free WiFi access and satellite TV. Each guest room also includes tea and coffee making facilities. All of the rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer. Breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room, and can be taken in the guest room. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar at Eiffel Capitol hotel. Dupleix Metro Station is 150 metres away, providing access to the Arc de Triomphe. Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre is 15 minutes away.

name: Hotel Louvre Bons Enfants
description: The Bons Enfants Hotel is located opposite Le Musée du Louvre and the Jardin des Tuileries in central Paris. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi access. With bright, modern decor, each room at the Hotel Louvre Bons Enfants has a private bathroom, a satellite TV and a radio. All rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box. A continental buffet breakfast is available every morning and can be served in the guest’s room. The Louvre Bons Enfants Hotel also provides a 24-hour reception and a car hire service. Many of Paris’s tourist attractions and shopping areas are within walking distance of this 1st arrondissement hotel. Notre Dame is a 20-minute walk away; the Centre Georges Pompidou is a 16-minute walk. The Palais Royal Musée du Louvre Metro station is 200 metres away and offers direct access to the Champs Elysees and the Opéra Garnier (Metro lines 1 and 7).

name: Acadia - Astotel
description: Acadia Opera is located in the 9th district of Paris, 800 metres from the famous department stores and a 10-minute walk to Opera Garnier. It offers free Wi-Fi access and a 24-hour reception. The bright, modern guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV and contemporary furniture. Each room includes complimentary non-alcoholic beverages in the minibar and all rooms are serviced by a lift. Hotel Acadia serves a daily buffet breakfast, which offers eggs, pastries, yogurt, hot drinks and fruit juice. It can be enjoyed in the brightly coloured dining room. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. The hotel is 200 metres from the Grand Boulevards Metro stop (lines 8 and 9), providing access to the city’s many sites. Gare de Nord train station is 1 km away.

name: Hôtel Les Jardins de La Villa
description: Set in a period building, Les Jardins De La Villa hotel offers guest rooms overlooking the landscaped courtyard. With a 24-hour reception, it features a fitness room, a sauna and a hammam. The soundproofed rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and free WiFi access. Some rooms feature a seating area. Some rooms open onto flowery balcony at Jardins De La Villa. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room with a retractable roof. Guests can enjoy drinks from the bar. This 4-star hotel is located just 400 metres from the Palais des Congrès and the Arc de Triomphe is 1.2 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hotel Oratio
description: Situated in the Latin Quarter, Hôtel Oratio is located in the heart of Paris, between Notre-Dame Cathedral and the Pantheon. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with free WiFi access. Each room has a classic décor and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathrooms are fitted with a shower and include a hairdryer and free toiletries. All rooms are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast made of fresh produce is served daily at the Hôtel Oratio in the dining room. The front desk is open 24 hours a day. Hôtel Oratio is 190 metres from Maubert Mutualité Metro Station, which can take guests to all the famous sites of Paris. It is 600 metres from Ile Saint-Louis and 750 metres from Jardin des Plantes. The nearest public car park is Parking Saemes Maubert Collège des Bernardins, 160 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Louvre Piemont
description: Located in the historical district of the right bank, this hotel is set opposite Palais Royal Garden. It offers modern guest rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access. Each air-conditioned guest room is equipped with a minibar. The guest rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel Louvre Piemont. Guests can enjoy breakfast while reading the newspapers provided. Palais Royal-Musée du Louvre Metro Station is just 260 metres from this hotel. Opéra Garnier is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Vaneau Saint Germain
description: This hotel is located a 15-minute walk from Saint-Germain-des-Près and 20 minutes from the Musée d’Orsay. Some of the rooms are equipped with stained-glass windows and marble fireplaces. All of the rooms at Hôtel Vaneau Saint Germain are ensuite and air-conditioned and have flat-screen TV with 30 international channels. Free wired and Wi-Fi internet is available in the rooms. Breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the dining area or in the comfort of your guestroom. Hôtel Vaneau Saint Germain also has a business centre for guests and the reception is open 24 hours a day. Vaneau Metro Station is just 110 metres from the hotel. An airport shuttle service can be requested at an extra cost.

name: Hotel Pavillon Bastille
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the Gare de Lyon Train and Metro Station, this renovated 19th-century townhouse is located opposite the Bastille Opera House. Free Wi-Fi access and cable TV are provided in all rooms. The stylish guest rooms are air-conditioned and decorated in neutral tones. Each room at Le Pavillon Bastille has welcome tray with tea, coffee and Infusion. The private bathrooms all include a hairdryer. Continental and buffet breakfasts are available daily and can be taken in the Pavillon’s landscaped courtyard and in the breakfast room according the weather. Staff are available 24 hours to advise on dining options and sights in the area, and a meeting room is available, upon prior reservation. Place des Vosges with its independent art galleries and the fashion boutiques of the Marais district are 15 minutes on foot. Bastille Metro Station is 150 metres from the hotel and offers many direct links to Paris sights including the Louvre and Galeries Lafayette.

name: ibis Paris Levallois-Perret
description: Located in the heart of Levallois, just a stone's throw from the Louise Michel metro station, the ibis Levallois Perret hotel is perfectly located for getting to St Lazare, Porte Maillot, La Défense and the Espace Champerret. The ibis Levallois Perret hot el has 53 completely renovated rooms, equipped with the new Sweet Bed by ibis bedding, air-conditioning and free WIFI. The hotel also has a bar with a terrace and a 24-hour snack service. Paying public car park close to the hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Magda Champs Elysées
description: The Arc de Triomphe is just 190 metres from this 3-star hotel. It features a bar and offers modern guest rooms with free internet access. Palais des Congrès Convention Centre is reachable within 7 minutes from Magda Champs Elysées using public transport. All of the elegant guest rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some rooms feature a seating area and overlook the courtyard at Magda Champs Elysées. The rooms also include the use of a personal smartphone, offering unlimited calls to over 100 countries. It also has a WiFi terminal, free video streaming services and many other free apps. Each private bathroom includes a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served every morning and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar in hotel Magda Champs Elysées. With public parking available nearby, the hotel is a 6-minute walk from the famous Champs Elysées. Charles de Gaulle – Etoile Metro Station is 190 metres away and provides direct access to the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre Museum and La Défense business area.

name: Cour des Vosges
description: The stones of the ancient kings of France have countless stories to tell. Today, they invite you to write your own. At the legendary royal square of the Place des Vosges, EVOK welcomes you into the family residence of a noble lineage of erudite scholars, collectors of art and precious moments. A birds-eye view over Square Louis XIII,surrounded by the pink brick pavilions crowned with slate roofs. The majestic arcades proudly aligned to greet the newcomers.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hyatt Paris Madeleine
description: Hyatt Paris Madeleine is located in central Paris, a 5-minute walk from Madeleine. It features a fitness and spa centre with sauna and massage treatments. Each air-conditioned room is individually decorated and has luxury modern wooden furnishings in light coloured tones. They have views over the Parisian Streets or the courtyard. They also feature a suite bathroom with a bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Le Cafe M restaurant serves breakfast and lunches prepared with seasonal produce. La Chinoiserie serves fresh, local cuisine and a gourmet dinner. It also offers snacks and drinks. Hyatt Paris Madeleine is situated a 5-minute walk from the famous shopping district Boulevard Haussmann, and 10-minutes from the Champs-Élysées. Saint-Augustin Metro Station is 500 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to all of Paris’s famous sites.

name: Timhotel Opera Madeleine
description: Advantageously located opposite the Gare Saint-Lazare and a few hours away from Normandy, the Timhotel Opra Madeleine gives you access to all the advantages of the central business district and the train station. The Timhotel Opra Madeleine welcomes you to a lovely Haussmann-style building located right near the Saint-Lazare metro station, where you have a choice of four lines that serve the entire city. With its warm welcome in any of five languages, its 24-hour reception, its luggage hold open night and day and its top-quality buffet breakfast, you can be sure of having a pleasant stay. The hotel can also host your business meetings. The district offers a full range of services and restaurants at all hours of the day.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Les Bulles De Paris
description: Inspired by champagne, Hotel Les Bulles De Paris is set in the heart of Paris' Latin Quarter, between Notre Dame and the Pantheon, not far from Luxembourg Gardens. Free WiFi access is available. Each designer room provides an LCD TV, and a minibar. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. Some rooms also include a coffee machine, bathrobes and slippers. At Les Bulles De Paris you can enjoy champagnes from around France as well as the hotel’s exclusive champagne. A sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is taken in the dining room that features a sparkling chandelier. Renowned cafes and popular spots for lunch are available in the surrounding area. The hotel is also conveniently located for shopping in the Marais district and Boulevard Saint Germain, and the historic department store, Le Bon Marché. A private, wellness area with sauna, hammam and treatment rooms is accessible at an extra charge. The hotel is 1.2 km from Louvre Museum and 1.3 km from Pompidou Centre. Maubert-Mutualité Metro Station is only 180 metres away.

name: Hotel Monte Cristo
description: Featuring a bar, Hôtel Montecristo is set in Paris, 1.9 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. The property is around 2.5 km from Opéra Bastille and 2.8 km from Pompidou Centre. The hotel features an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms come with a seating area. All guest rooms at Hôtel Montecristo include air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and an indoor pool. A business centre and vending machines with drinks are available on site at Hôtel Montecristo. Louvre Museum is 3 km from the hotel, while Orsay Museum is 3.5 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 13 km away.

name: Hotel Aiglon
description: Located in the heart of the Montparnasse district, this design hotel is just 30 metres from the Raspail Metro stop. Guest rooms are modern and stylish with free Wi-Fi access. Each room at the Aiglon is soundproofed and air conditioned, and equipped with a mini-bar and satellite TV. All the guest rooms are accessible via a lift. The Aiglon hotel serves a continental breakfast every morning, which can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of the guest rooms. Guests can relax with a drink in the bar, or in the lounge with library. Additional facilities at the Aiglon include a 24-hour reception with express check-in, car hire and a tour desk.

name: Hôtel Atlantis Saint Germain des Prés
description: Hôtel Atlantis is set opposite the Gothic-style Saint Sulpice Church. Decorated in rich colours, the hotel’s lounge bar sits under a glass ceiling and is furnished with armchairs. A minibar, free Wi-Fi and satellite TV are provided in each room. Guest rooms have a classical French-style. Each has a private bathroom and some rooms have views of the church. Enjoy a continental breakfast in the breakfast room, while reading the newspapers provided. The Atlantis hotel has a 24-hour reception and provides luggage storage. Saint Sulpice Metro Station is just 100 metres away, providing direct access to the Montparnasse district. The Luxembourg Gardens are 300 metres away.

name: Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa
description: Boasting a restaurant, bar and views of city, Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa is set in Paris, less than 1 km from Gare Saint-Lazare. With a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, the rooms come with a desk. Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa features some units that feature a balcony, and the rooms are equipped with a coffee machine. All guest rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a TV with satellite channels and an iPad. Guests at Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Opéra Garnier, Pigalle Metro Station and La Cigale Concert Hall. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 24 km from Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa.

name: Hôtel & Spa Royal Madeleine
description: Boasting a fitness centre and a spa & wellness centre, Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa is situated in Paris. It is 600 metres from Édouard VII Theatre, 500 metres from Olympia and Opéra Garnier and a 14-minute walk from Tuileries Garden. The property is located in the 8th arr. District, 1.4 km from Orsay Museum. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. With a private bathroom, they also feature free WiFi. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves European cuisine. When guests need guidance on where to visit, the reception will be happy to provide advice. Galeries Lafayette and Printemps Department Stores are 400 metres away. La Cigale Concert Hall is a 19-minute walk from Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa, while Louvre Museum is a 20-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Parister & Spa
description: Located in Paris, a 2-minute walk from Cadet Metro Station and the Folies Bergère Theatre, and 1.2 km from Opera Garnier, Hotel Parister & Spa features restaurant and a bar, as well as a spa center with a swimming-pool, hammam and a fitness centre available for free. The air-conditioned rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. They all have a Marshall speaker and a private bathroom with free Nuxe toiletries, bathrobes and slippers, while some features a spa bath. Hotel Parister & Spa features free WiFi throughout the property. Breakfast are available each morning from 7am to 10am and until 10.30am on Sunday. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Sacré-Coeur is 1.3 km from Hotel Parister & Spa. Paris - Orly Airport is 16 km away.

name: Hôtel Beauregard
description: Located next to Vaugirard Metro station, Hotel Hôtel Beauregard is a 2.2 km from the Eiffel Tower. It offers rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. Each guest room at the Hôtel Beauregard has a contemporary decor and an en suite bathroom. Some also have a private balcony, with a view of the Eiffel Tower. A full buffet breakfast is served daily. Hotel Hôtel Beauregard is 1.6 km from the Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre. It is a short Metro ride from the Champs-Elysees and the Montmartre district.

name: Hotel Villathena
description: The Villathena is a design hotel located in the Opera district of Paris. It offers air conditioned accommodation with a contemporary décor, a free Wi-Fi access and a 24-hour reception. Each guest room at Hotel Villathena offers a flat screen TV with a DVD player and a minibar. All have a private bathroom complete with amenities and a hairdryer. The buffet breakfast is offered daily in the breakfast room. The continental breakfast can also be served in guest’s rooms. The Hotel is situated 300 metres from Saint Lazare Metro Station. It provides direct access to the Avenue Champs-Elysées and Place de la Concorde. Guests can also walk to Galeries Lafayette in 10 minutes. When booking more than 4 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

name: The Remix Hotel
description: Refurbished by the well-known designer Saar Zafrir, The ReMIX Hotel offers a bar, co-working space, 10 meeting rooms and a gym in the trendy La Villette district in Paris. The modern guest rooms are decorated with a blend of Parisian glamour and 80s rock and feature headboards with integrated USB ports, high speed WiFi and a flat-screen TV with Chromecast. The marble bathrooms have a shower or a bathtub. A buffet breakfast is available from 06:30 to 10:00, and guests can enjoy a coffee in the co-working space. The reception is open 24 hours a day. The Zénith and Philharmonie de Paris concert venues are within a 10-minute walk of The ReMIX Hotel. The hotel is served by metro lines 7, 5 and 3b, as well as the RER E, and areas such as the Opéra district can be reached within 15 minutes. The hotel can also be reached via bike along the Ourcq Canal and there is a public bike station nearby.

name: Hotel Ernest
description: Conveniently set in the 10th arr. District of Paris, Hotel Ernest is set 1.3 km from Pigalle Metro Station, less than 1 km from Gare de l'Est and a 14-minute walk from La Cigale Concert Hall. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Gare du Nord. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also offer city views. At the hotel all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at Hotel Ernest. Opéra Garnier is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Louvre Museum is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from Hotel Ernest.

name: Hotel Murat
description: Hotel Murat is located in the 16th district of Paris, close to the banks of the River Seine. It is just 150 metres from the Porte de Saint-Cloud Metro Station, which leads directly to Place du Trocadéro. This 19th-century building provides en suite rooms equipped with satellite TV, Wi-Fi internet access and a hairdryer. Hotel Murat serves a daily buffet breakfast. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s bar and lounge area where complimentary newspapers are available. The Parc des Princes and Roland Garros Stadiums are within easy access of the hotel. The town of Boulogne-Billancourt is 1 km away.

name: Hotel Palym
description: Hotel Palym is located on a quiet street just 2 minutes from Gare de Lyon and a 15-minute walk from AccorHotels Arena. It offers modern accommodation with Wi-Fi access. Rooms at Palym are decorated in warm colours and offer an LCD TV with cable channels. All rooms have a private bathroom and some feature an antique fireplace. Fresh Viennese pastries and fruit are served in the breakfast room every morning. Non-alcoholic and hot beverages are also served at the bar which is in the colourful lounge area. The hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Paris’ China Town and local transport links lead directly to sights such as Le Louvre and Le Marais district.

name: Hôtel Vinci Due & Spa
description: Well set in the centre of Paris, Hôtel Vinci Due & Spa offers 4-star accommodation close to Orsay Museum and Musée de l'Orangerie. Featuring a spa and wellness centre, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around less than 1 km from Louvre Museum, 1.7 km from Rodin Museum and 1.8 km from Luxembourg Gardens. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All units include a wardrobe. Guests at Hôtel Vinci Due & Spa can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sainte-Chapelle, Tuileries Garden and Opéra Garnier. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 16 km from Hôtel Vinci Due & Spa.

name: Hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile
description: Arc De Triomphe Etoile is located in the centre of Paris, just a 5-minute walk from the Place de l'Etoile and the Champs Elysées. It offers classic air-conditioned rooms. All rooms at the Arc de Triomphe Etoile are equipped with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire hotel. A minibar features in each room and the private bathrooms include a hairdryer. A full buffet breakfast is served every morning and a modern bar is at your disposal along with daily newspapers. The hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile also provides a 24-hour reception with laundry facilities and an elevator that services all floors. Metro Ternes is 220 metres away and gives guests access to all of Paris’s famous sites. Metro Charles de Gaulle–Etolie has a direct train to Disneyland.

name: Home Latin
description: Hotel Home Latin is located right in the heart of the Latin Quarter. It is only two minutes walk from the Luxembourg Garden, the Sorbonne, the Panthéon and Notre Dame cathedral. The spacious guest rooms are all equipped with a bathroom (shower or bath), direct-line telephone and satellite TV. The first 5 floors are accessible by lift. A healthy breakfast is available in one of the hotel's two breakfast rooms every morning. A guest lounge is provided for relaxing with friends. The hotel also offers quick access to the main metro and RER lines, making it a very central point. Upon request, the reception can provide a variety of extra services.

name: Hotel Riesner
description: Set in central Paris, this hotel is 350 metres from Gare de Lyon RER Station. It features a 24-hour reception with a ticket service and offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Each guest room includes free Wi-Fi access and tea and coffee making facilities. All of the rooms are serviced by a lift. The private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning. Vending machines selling drinks and snacks are also available. The Hôtel Riesner hotel is just 400 metres from Saint-Martin Canal and the Jardin des Plantes is a 10-minute walk away. The Arc de Triomphe and Disneyland Paris are both accessible via Gare de Lyon.

name: Tinah - Champs Elysées
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 5 air-conditioned rooms featuring Smart televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a living plant wall, and tour/ticket assistance. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby and an elevator. Property Location With a stay at Tinah - Champs Elysées, you'll be centrally located in Paris, just a 5-minute walk from Champs-Élysées and 14 minutes by foot from Place de la Concorde. This hotel is 1.2 mi (1.9 km) from Arc de Triomphe and 1.2 mi (2 km) from Palais Garnier. Dining Continental breakfasts are served on weekdays from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 5.00 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for continental breakfast: approximately EUR 12 per person Futon bed fee: EUR 20 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 1:00 PM Checkin end at anytime The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve sofa beds This property accepts credit cards; cash is not accepted Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher and a smoke detector There is no front desk at this property. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property at least 48 hours before arrival using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests will receive an email 48 hours before arrival with check-in instructions and an access code. Guests can access their accommodation through a private entrance. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions Property is cleaned with disinfectant Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Property follows sanitization practices of COVID-19 Guidelines (CDC) Property does not offer onsite COVID-19 testing Property does not require health documentation at check-inViajes Exito Hotels

name: Hotel Des Nations Saint Germain
description: Hôtel des Nations Saint Germain is in the heart of the Latin Quarter, 15 minutes from Notre Dame and a few steps from the famous Rue Mouffetard. It offers en suite rooms with a TV and free Wi-Fi. Air conditioning, a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities feature in all the rooms at Hotel des Nations. Each has free toiletries in the private bathroom. The hotel serves a full-English breakfast every morning in the breakfast room. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception with luggage storage and a laundry service. Located on one of the oldest streets in Paris, the hotel is a 5-minute walk from Jardin des Plantes. Place Monge Metro station is 2 minutes away providing direct access to the Louvre Museum and Opéra Garnier.

name: Timhotel Opera Blanche Fontaine
description: At 200 metres from the famous Moulin Rouge, the Timhotel Opra Blanche Fontaine will welcome you between the Opera districts and Montmartre. Located not far from the gare Saint-Lazare, the Department Stores (Galeries Lafayette Boulevard Haussmann) and the boulevard de Clichy, the hotel proposes a very relaxing and quiet place in the heart of a bustling area oriented towards music and theatre: ideal to discover world renowned Parisian shows and to get to the strategic points of the Capital.In a beautiful private courtyard away from the bustle, the Timhotel Opra Blanche Fontaine will welcome you 24H/24 in three languages. In addition to its air-conditioned rooms, some of which with a view over the Eiffel Tower or Montmartre, the hotel will propose to you a generous breakfast on a buffet, LCD screens, a parking and the free WIFI. The particularly warm welcome will orient you towards the best tips to discover the Paris of the Parisians. Complete offer of services and of catering at any time in the area.iHotelier/iStay

name: Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle
description: Situated in Paris and with Rodin Museum reachable within 2.4 km, Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is fitted with a kettle, while some rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. At Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Eiffel Tower is 2.4 km from the accommodation, while Orsay Museum is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle.

name: Serotel Lutece
description: Serotel Lutèce is located in Paris, a 10-minute walk from Jardin du Luxembourg. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, some feature a private balcony. Each room has classic décor and is equipped with satellite TV, tea and coffee making facilities and private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by lift. A buffet breakfast is served daily at the Serotel Lutèce’s chic dining area. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or on the terrace overlooking the garden. The hotel provides an airport shuttle service. A 24-hour front desk with laundry facilities is available. Censier – Daubenton Metro station is 500 metres from Serotel Lutèce, giving direct access to Opera and Chatelet. Jardin des Plantes is 850 metres from the hotel, River Seine and Notre Dame Cathedral is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Beige
description: The Hôtel Beige is located in the heart of Paris between the Opéra Garnier and Montmartre. Its rooms offer views over the rooftops of Paris. All of the en suite rooms at Hôtel Beige+ are soundproofed and have flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Coffee, tea and drinks can be enjoyed in the hotel’s ground-floor lounge, where a daily breakfast buffet is also served. During their stay, guests can rent a portable WiFi key from the reception, available for a fee. Hôtel Beige is serviced by a lift and offers 24-hour front desk service and free luggage storage.

name: Timhotel Le Louvre
address: 4 Rue Croix Des Petits Champs, 75001 Paris
description: Near the Louvre and the famous Rue de Rivoli and Rue Saint-Honor, the Timhotel Le Louvre offers a location that's not only in the heart of Paris, but, more importantly, in the heart of French history. Here you can enjoy the cultural and fine dining pleasures of the Capital. The Timhotel Le Louvre is ideally located on a quiet little street in the heart of Paris. The team is available 24 hours a day to give you a warm welcome in your choice of 5 languages. The hotel, with its air-conditioned rooms and a pleasant, flower-bedecked patio where you can enjoy a buffet breakfast in good weather, will make your stay in Paris an excellent one. At any time of day, the district offers all the services and restaurants you could want.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile
description: Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile, formerly the Hotel Concorde La Fayette, is 1.5 km from both the Arc de Triomphe and the famous Champs Elysées. The guest rooms each include a desk, cable TV, air conditioning and a safe. All rooms at the Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile offers views over Paris. Deluxe bath products are provided in the private bathrooms. MAYO restaurant in the lobby of the hotel offers guests a seasonal cuisine and local products. This hotel is connected to the Palais des Congrès and La Defense business district is only 5 minutes away by Metro. A concierge and a business centre are among the additional services. Porte Maillot Metro Station is an 8-minute walk away.

name: Hotel William's Opera
description: Overlooking Montholon Square, this 3-star hotel is a 15-minute walk from Galeries Lafayette department store and the Sacré Coeur. Cadet Metro Station is just 150 metres away. Large windows overlooking the square are featured in all of the rooms at Hotel William’s Opera. All rooms have an LCD TV with satellite channels and access to the hotel’s Wi-Fi connection. Guests can enjoy a buffet in the breakfast room, which is decorated in Mediterranean colours. Additional facilities at William’s Opera include a 24-hour reception with luggage storage. Gare du Nord national and international train station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Guests may also choose to visit sights such as Le Louvre Museum or Place de l’Opéra, which are accessed using local transport links.

name: Dauphine Saint Germain
description: Nestled between Saint-Germain-des-Prés and The Latin Quarter, this boutique hotel is located in a 17th century building, a 10-minute walk from Notre Dame. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access. Guest rooms at Dauphine Saint Germain are elegantly decorated and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Each room has an en suite bathroom with complimentary toiletries and rooms are serviced by a lift. Guests can enjoy a continental breakfast of fresh pastries and cereals served each morning in a breakfast room with an arched stone ceiling. A 24-hour room service is available for drinks and snacks. Dauphine Saint Germain offers free daily newspapers and a complimentary shoe shine service. Metro Station Saint-Michel is located a 5-minute walk from the hotel and offers direct access to the Montmartre District. The Louvre is a 20-minute walk away. An airport shuttle service can be requested at an extra charge.

name: Est Hotel
description: The Est Hotel is centrally located near Gare de L'Est and Gare du Nord Train Stations. It offers affordable accommodation and friendly service. Rooms are equipped with TV and en suite facilities. Free Wi-Fi access is available. A number of shops, theatres and restaurants are located within walking distance to the hotel. The Est Hotel is next to Grands Boulevards, and is walking distance to the Centre Pompidou and the popular Marais district. The nearest Metro Station is Gare de l'Est, 400 metres away.

name: Hotel Montparnasse Alesia
description: Located in a lively street in south-west Paris, this hotel is 600 metres from Alésia Metro Station. It has a 24-hour reception and offers soundproofed accommodation with free, unlimited Wi-Fi access. The air-conditioned guest rooms at Montparnasse Alésia are simply decorated and equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Tea and coffee making facilities are provided. The hotel serves a continental buffet breakfast every morning in the breakfast room. The surrounding district offers a range of dining options catering to many tastes and budgets. Montparnasse Alésia is less than 20 minutes’ walk from La Tour Montparnasse. Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre is 2.6 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Claret
description: This hotel is located 10 minutes from Gare de Lyon Train Station by foot. It offers guest rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi access. Each room has views of the garden or the street. The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer. Bastille district is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Bercy Park and the Cinémathèque Museum are both just 300 metres away. Parking is available on site for an additional charge.

name: La Clef Louvre Paris by The Crest Collection
description: No description found

name: Majestic Hotel - Spa Champs Elysées
description: This 5-star hotel is located in Paris’s 16th district just 400 metres from Place de l'Étoile and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and guests have free access to the spa facilities. Rooms at Majestic Hotel Spa combine old Parisian style and more contemporary pieces of art. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom. Some rooms and suites have a private terrace or kitchenette. Wi-Fi access is available in all the rooms and the hotel also has facilities for disabled guests. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées wellness spa has a swimming pool, hammam and fitness room. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées is 190 metres from Kléber Metro Station (line 6) and 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro (lines 1, 2 and 6). The Eiffel Tower is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and the Champs Elysées is 5 minutes away.

name: Hôtel Clarisse
description: Clarisse is located in Paris, 700 metres from Parc des Expositions Exhibition Centre and 200 metres from Square Georges Brassens. This hotel was renovated in September 2018 and offers rooms with free WiFi access. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift. Breakfast is served daily in at the Clarisse’s dining room. The hotel is 350 metres from Metro Porte de Vanves, which has direct access to Invalides and Saint-Lazare. The T3 tramway stop is just opposite the hotel.

name: Hotel Des Mines
description: Hotel Des Mines is located in central Paris, 200 metres from the Jardin du Luxembourg and 1.5 km from Montparnasse Train Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi access. Each soundproofed room has simple décor and is equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom. All rooms are serviced by a lift and featured a safety deposit box. Breakfast is served every morning in the dining room, or in the comfort of your own room. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. Newspapers are featured. A 24-hour front-desk is available on site and express check-in/check-out can be provided. St-Germain des Prés and the Latin Quarter are just a 15-minute walk away. Hotel Des Mines is 300 metres from RER station Luxembourg, which leads directly to Notre Dame, Chatelet and Orly and CDG Airports.

name: L'Oasis Montparnasse
description: Located in the 14th district of Paris, Hotel Oasis Montparnasse offers a terrace. It is just a 5-minute walk from the Montparnasse Tower and its train Station. All of the rooms at Hotel Oasis Montparnasse have a flat-screen TV, an electric kettle and a private bathroom with hairdryer and shower. The suite also comes with a terrace. A continental breakfast is available each morning in the communal lounge and guests can enjoy oriental and French cuisine at the hotel's restaurant. Other facilities at the hotel include free Wi-Fi access. Hotel Oasis Montparnasse is located in front of Pernety Metro Station.

name: Hotel Albe Bastille
description: Located in the heart of Paris, this hotel is decorated with original stonework and period artwork. It has an interior courtyard and provides free Wi-Fi access. Hotel Albe Bastille is entirely non-smoking, and the air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with an LCD TV and an iPod docking station. Breakfast is served every morning at hotel Albe Bastille, and guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Place des Vosges in the Marais district. The nearest Metro Station is just 250 metres away, providing access to the famous department store, Galeries Lafayette.

name: Auteuil Tour Eiffel
description: Located in the heart of the 16th-district of Paris, this modern hotel features private parking on site and a shaded terrace in the garden. It is situated 2 km from the Eiffel Tower and Bois de Boulogne and 3 km from Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre. The rooms at Auteuil Tour Eiffel are equipped with a satellite TV, free WiFi and tea and coffee making facilities. Each room has a private bathroom including a hairdryer and L'Occitane free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony. A buffet breakfast including fresh bread, pastries and homemade specialities is served every morning. Organic products are available. The hotel offers a 24-hour reception, a sauna and a 24-hour fitness room. Wireless internet connection is also available in public areas. Guests can relax and enjoy a drink in the property's lounge. Auteuil Tour Eiffel is 500 metres from Mirabeau Metro Station and 600 metres from Avenue du Président Kennedy RER Train Station (Line C).

name: First Hotel Paris Tour Eiffel
description: First is located a 5-minute walk from the Champs de Mars and a 15-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. It is a design hotel offering air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and free Wi-Fi access. Guest rooms and suites at First Hotel are contemporary in style and decorated in black and white. Each has an LCD TW with Free air channels and some have views of Paris’ rooftops or the Eiffel Tower. La Motte-Picquet-Grenelle Metro Station is 300 metres away and provides direct access to Trocadéro and the best views of the Eiffel Tower. Hotel des Invalides is just a 10-minute walk away. A deposit of €50" will be requested as a guarantee either by card or in cash returned on departure.

name: LYRIC Hotel Paris
description: Located in the heart of Paris, Lyric Hôtel Paris is a design hotel just 450 metres from the Opera Garnier. Guests will have free access to the hammam, sauna and the indoor swimming pool, and there is also a fitness room. All of rooms at Lyric Hôtel Paris have music-inspired décor, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a wardrobe. The bathroom is fitted with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Other facilities include a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi access and a wellness centre (subject to availability). The hotel is ideally located 80 metres from Quatre Septembre Metro Station (Line 3) and a 10-minute walk from Opera Metro Station.

name: L'Amiral
description: Hotel Amiral is situated between the Eiffel Tower, Montparnasse railway station and Porte de Versaille Exhibition Centre which is 1.8 km from the property and can be directly accessed with public transport. It offers affordable accommodation and free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. The Hotel Amiral rooms have private bathrooms and are equipped with a TV and telephone. The Amiral is conveniently situated just 250 metres from the Vaugirard Metro (line 12). The hotel is in Paris’ 15th arrondisement, which is also home to the Bourdelle Museum and The Pasteur Institute.

name: Eiffel Kennedy
description: Located in the chic 16th district in Paris, this hotel is 450 metres from the Statue of Liberty. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV. Each guest room has a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by a lift. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room at hotel Eiffel Kennedy. With a 24-hour reception, Eiffel Kennedy hotel also provides a tour desk and a ticket service. The Eiffel Tower is a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Ranelagh Metro Station is 500 metres away, providing access to the Champs Elysées. An airport shuttle is available upon request.

name: Lautrec Opera
description: The Hotel Lautrec Opera is ideally located across from the Opera Comique, close to the Grands Boulevards and major department stores and near the Garnier Opera and Madeleine.Welcome to the Hotel Lautrec Opera, where charm and comfort combine with contemporary style.Located in the centre of Paris across from the Opera Comique, our hotel is just a few minutes walk from the Garnier Opera, the Palais-Royal Theatre, major department stores, the Louvre, Concorde and the Grevin Museum.Its favourable location will facilitate your trips around the capital.WIHP

name: Best Western Hotel Le Montparnasse
description: The Best Western Hotel Le Montparnasse is a 5-minute walk from the Paris-Montparnasse TGV (high-speed train) station and the Air France terminal, with direct links to the Roissy Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports. Nearby is the Tour Eiffel, the Jardin du Luxembourg, the Rue de Rennes and many restaurants and shops where you can stroll at your leisure. Not far from St Germain des prés and Eiffel Tower area. The Best Western Hotel Le Montparnasse was fully refurbished in 2010 so you can enjoy the new design and high-end services: individual air-conditioning, free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel, soft quilts for a refreshing night's sleep. You will also enjoy the "extras": Espresso machines, iPod dock and 32-inch LED TV. The bathrooms feature: relaxing "rain" showers, handy hairdryers and anti-steam mirrors to save time. You will be welcomed by a dedicated team attentive to your needs, so you can taste Parisian life and fully enjoy your stay on the Left Bank, in a district with a multitude of great restaurants and shops. The Best Western Hotel Le Montparnasse is at your service for business trips or tourism breaks to the French capital. Nearby: the Montparnasse Tower, the Rue de Rennes, Saint Germain des Prés, Les Invalides, the Eiffel Tower, etc.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel de Seze
description: Just 50 metres from the Eglise de la Madeleine and its metro stop, Hotel de Sèze offers suites and rooms set in a renovated stately townhouse. On site you will find a hammam, a fitness centre and a 24-hour front desk. Each air-conditioned room features free WiFi access, a desk and a 42-inch LED TV with 42 satellite channels and free video on demand. The private bathrooms have a bathtub or a walk-in shower with a rain shower-head, free luxury toiletries, bathrobe and slippers. Breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge with an additional cost. A minibar, Nespresso© coffee machine and electric kettle are also available in each room. Several shops, restaurants and luxury boutiques can be found within walking distance from the hotel. Hotel de Sèze is 300 metres from the Opéra Garnier, 700 metres from the Place de la Concorde and 700 metres from Saint-Lazare Train Station. Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport is 22 km away.

name: Hôtel Henri 4
description: This hotel is situated in Paris’ Left Bank, 350 metres from Notre Dame Cathedral and a 25-minute walk from the Louvre and the Musée d’Orsay museums. Some rooms feature views over the cathedral. Each room at the Hôtel Henri 4 has a TV with satellite channels, a minibar and air conditioning. The en suite bathroom features a bathtub and free toiletries. In the morning guests can choose to order a continental breakfast or a buffet breakfast. This can be taken in the breakfast room, the terrace or in guests’ rooms. Located between Saint-Michel and Saint-Germain boulevards, 2 of the most famous and lively streets in the French capital, this charming hotel welcomes you in an authentic decor from the 17th century with elegant furnishings and a fireplace.

name: Hotel Aulivia Opera
description: Hotel Aulivia Opéra is located in Paris, a 2-minute walk from Château d'Eau Metro Station and a 11-minute walk from Gare du Nord Train Station. It also offers free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a work desk and en suite facilities. Breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the breakfast room or in the guests' rooms. Friendly staff can advise on sightseeing in Paris and the local area. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance. A 24-hours front desk and a luggage storage are available at the property. The Canal Saint-Martin is 1 km from the property.

name: Hotel du Louvre in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description: Located in the heart of Paris, this 5-star hotel offers elegant guest rooms in a Hausmannian-style building. Entirely renovated in 2019, it features a concierge and a tour desk with ticket service. Decorated in a unique style, the bright air-conditioned guest rooms at the Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are equipped with satellite TV, a minibar and free WiFi access. Many rooms offer views of famous Parisian landmarks and all rooms have a private bathroom, some include decorated with marble.
